41014007	Aeniki awataka awo mukiaza okuwa nawo amiire goona , kutio muuza okuwatunzia enyinga-unyinga ezia muwuine . Ni inze ngamuuza okuwa ni inze amiire goona .
41014008	Iye amiire okukola ekia akakola , kandi awakre omuwiri gwange amavuta ne enyinga zikiari kugere omuwiri gwange guikagre owuawizi .
41014009	Mbalaga kuwuene mbwe asi-uasi aa * injiili eeza okulanziwua mu ekialo kiona , ekia omukazi ono akorre kino kiiza okugamba-gambwako na awantu wamuingirizia . ”
41014010	Nikuemao , Yudaasi Iskarioti , owawanga omulala ku awalonzi awa Yesu ikumi ni wawiri , yagia ku awakangasi awa awoozia kugere ate Yesu mu amakono gaawu .
41014011	Olwa waawurra ekingʼana ekio waasangaala ino , kandi waamwifuuwira mbwe waaza okumu-aa amasendi . Yudaasi yatanika okuagala iwaga ilungi eria okumuta mu amakono gaawu .
41014012	Owuire owusookere mu * omugomo ogwa Omukaati ogutazogrwe na amamera , olwa waakolanga omusango ogwa ekimaatwa ekia Pasaaka , awalonzi awa Yesu waamuwuuzia watino , “ Omwami , na ai aa wagala mbwe tukuikazizie Pasaaka orie ? ”
41014013	Okwo kwagera atuma awalonzi waae wawiri na awalaga otino , “ Mugie ku omugizi ogwa Yerusaleemu , ni munaagana omuntu ogingre entamu eya amanzi , mumulonde .
41014014	Ni mu enyumba eya anaingira , mulage omwene enyumba eyo mutino , ‘ Omugerezi atutumre tuuze tukuwuuzie mbwe enyumba yaae eya awageni eya akariiramo omugomo ogwa Pasaaka na awalonzi waae eriai ? ’
41014015	Omuntu oyo aaza okuwalaga enyumba enkaate eri kungulu ku egoroofa erimo ewintu wiona ewiagalana kandi eya awantu waesa okuikalamo . Ao nio mutuikazizie tuuze turiiremo . ”
41014016	Awalonzi awo waafuma wagia ku omugizi ogwa Yerusaleemu wagia watuukra ewintu mala kiomo Yesu yawanga na awalagre . Kutio waafumba okuria okwa Pasaaka wakuikazia omwo .
41014017	Olwa kwatuuka igulo , Yesu yaaza na awalonzi waae ikumi ni wawiri .
41014018	Ni waawanga ku emeesa ni waria , Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Mbalaga kuwuene mbwe omulala ku inywe aaza okunguzia . Ee omuntu oyo aria ni inze . ”
41014019	Woona waawurra uwiiwi ino kandi watanika okumulaga mulala ki omulala watino , “ Kuwuene oyo ngʼani inze yaaya Omwami ? ”
41014020	Yesu yawalaga otino , “ No omulala ku inywe * awatumwa ikumi ni wawiri , oiniizie omukaate ni inze mu oludaawo .
41014021	No * Omuzia owa Omuntu aaza okufwa aemeo mala kiomo kwajojwa ku iye . Ni kuriweera omuntu omuguziizie wululu ino ! Kukaweere geeza ku iye , ni yareka okuiwulwa . ”
41014022	Ni waawanga ni waria , Yesu yatoola omukaate , aikazia Katonda nikwo agugenyula aa awalonzi waae na awalaga otino , “ Mutoole murie . Guno no omuwiri gwange . ”
41014023	Nikuemao yatoola ekikombe , aikazia Katonda nikwo aki-aa awalonzi waae , kandi woona waakinyweramo .
41014024	Nikuemao yawalaga otino , “ Gano na amasaai gange aga * endagano , agafukirwa awantu awangi .
41014025	Mbalaga mbwe ngʼanyiza okunywa edivaai eema ku ensaafu eya * omuzabiibu kandi , nawuno kutuuke olwa ndirinywa edivaai empia mu * Owuami owua Katonda . ”
41014026	Olwa waamala okuemba olwembo otino , waafuma ni wawariire ekigiri ekia * Zaituuni .
41014027	Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Inywe mwona muuza okundumuka , aeniki kwajojwa mbwe , “ ‘ Nyiza okuita omwayi , kandi amagondi gaaza okutaanyika . ’
41014028	Ni , ni Katonda amiire okunziusia , nyiza okukangata emberi iinyu , ngie Galiili . ”
41014029	Petro yamuirania otino , “ Omwami , namba na awandi woona wakurumuuke , inze ngʼandirikureka . ”
41014030	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Nkulaga kuwuene mbwe owuire owua turiko wuno , ooza okulowa kasatu mbwe ngomanyire , engoko ni zikiari okulagula kawiri . ”
41014031	Ni Petro yalowa wukalu na awoola otino , “ Namba ni kuri okufwa ni iwue , nanyiza okukulowa , yaaya . ” Awalonzi wandi woona waawoola watio .
41014032	Nikuemao Yesu na awalonzi waae waagia watuuka asi aetwa mbwe Gethsemaani . Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Muikale ano , inze ngie nsawe . ”
41014033	Yatoola Petro , Yakoobo ni Yowaana agia nawo antulo , kandi atanika okuwurra owululu mu omwoyo gwae kandi amasaai gaatanika okumuluma ino .
41014034	Nikuemao yawalaga mbwe , “ Mpurra owululu mu omwoyo gwange ino , aa wuagala okunzita . Muweere ano kandi muwe amiiso . ”
41014035	Yesu yagia emberi wutono , nikwo agwa ansi atanika okusawa Katonda wululu na awoola mbwe ni kuesekana aganye amutoorreo ekikombe ekia emidambo ekio atakinyweramo . Yagia emberi na awoola otino ,
41014036	“ Soifu ! Manyire mbwe ewintu wiona wiesekana ku iwue , ntoorreo ekikombe kino . Ni kutaaza kwawa ku okuagala kwange , ni kuwe mala kiomo iwue oagala . ”
41014037	Yairana ku awalonzi waae atuukra ni wagona . Kutio yawuuzia Petro otino , “ Simioni , owuo ogona ? Ngoesa okuwarra namba ku enyinga endala ?
41014038	Muwe amiiso kandi musawe kugere mutagwa ni mugeezaniwua . Omwoyo guagala , no omuwiri mudewenyu . ”
41014039	Yawareka kandi olwa okuwiri agia asawa , na awoola mala amangʼana aga yawoola kuluweri .
41014040	Olwa yawairanako kandi , yawatuukra ni wagona , aeniki amiiso gaawu gaawanga amazito . Waagingirizia amiiso ni waawula ne ekia wakamulaga .
41014041	Yairana kandi olwa okusatu , awawuuzia otino , “ Owuo mukiagona , kandi muigoloole muwuluuka ? Endoolo zisugre katio . Enyinga zimiire okutuuka ezia Omuzia owa Omuntu aaza okuguziwua ateewue mu amakono aga awooni .
41014042	Mulamuke tugie ! Omuguzi wange nguno aaza ! ”
41014043	Ni Yesu yawanga na akiagamba-gamba , Yudaasi , owawanga omulala ku awalonzi ikumi ni wawiri , yawatuukako na ari no omurima ogwa awantu awagingre emiambe egia olugangala ne ewirungu , awaatumwa na awakangasi awa awoozia , awagerezi awa endagirra na * awagaaka awa * Awayaudi okuuza okuamba Yesu .
41014044	Kuno kwatuukra no omuguzi yawanga na amiire okuwurzania nawo mbwe , “ Omuntu owa munawona ni nuunre , niye . Mumuambe , mugie nae no owurinzi owukalu . ”
41014045	Olwa Yudaasi yatuuka otino , yagia ku Yesu owuigoloole amulaga otino , “ Geeza Omugerezi ? ” Nikuemao amunuuna .
41014046	Nikuemao awantu awo waa-amba Yesu .
41014047	No omulala ku awalonzi awaawanga ni waimeriire nae ao yazomola omwambe gwae ogwa olugangala , aguta ku owemirimo owa Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia , amukewa okutwi kuwuera ansi chee .
41014048	Yesu yawawuuzia otino , “ Munyiziire ne emiambe egia olugangala ne ewirungu ki awagia okuamba omukangasi olwania esirikaali otino kolaki ?
41014049	Nyamiire okuwa ni nyikala ni inywe mu olwanyi olwa * ekaalu ni ngerera owuire ki owuire , mutampamba ? Ni mureke amangʼana aga Katonda gatuuke kiomo gaajojwa . ”
41014050	Nikuemao , awalonzi woona waarumuka wamureka .
41014051	Ario omuzia wundi owalondanga Yesu na aingiizie enguwo empuuwu . Olwa awantu wano waagia okumuamba otino ,
41014052	yasomoka areka enguwo yaae , agia ekikuna .
41014053	Awantu awo waira Yesu aa Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia . Awakangasi awa awoozia , na awagerezi awa endagirra na awagaaka awa Awayaudi woona waawanga ni wiikumizie alala ao .
41014054	Petro yamulondanga enyima ale wutono nawuno watuuka waingira mu olwanyi oluri agati eya amayumba aga Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia . Munsi omwo Petro yaikala na awarinzi na aota omurro .
41014055	Awakangasi awa awoozia no * oluwuga olwa awagaaka awa Awayaudi woona waagarizia okawoola ekintu ekiwiiwi ku Yesu , ekikagera akengerwe ekiina ekia olumbe , ni ngawakatuukra .
41014056	Aeniki awantu awangi waamuwoolako amangʼana amangi aga owuweeyi , na amangʼana gaawu ago gaagawukana .
41014057	Awandi ku awantu awo waaza waimerra nae kandi wamuwoolako owuweeyi watino ,
41014058	“ Twamiire okumuwurra na awoola mbwe , ‘ Nyiza okuona ekaalu eyaombokwa na awantu eno , kandi ku amiire asatu nyiza okuomboka eindi , etaombookwe na awantu . ’ ”
41014059	Namba awantu wano , woona amangʼana gaawu gaagawukana .
41014060	Nikuemao Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia yaimerra agati yaawu awuuzia Yesu otino , “ Ngoirania ingʼana ku ewintu ewia wakuwoolako wino , kolaki ? ”
41014061	Ni Yesu yasarigira kiri kandi ngakairania . Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia oyo yamuwuuzia kandi otino , “ Iwue ni iwue * Meesia , omuzia owa * Omwami Katonda ? ”
41014062	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Ni inze , kandi muuza okuwona Omuzia owa Omuntu na aikaale nyakukono okusaaza okwa Katonda aa amaani gari , kandi na aaza mu amare aga ku igulu . ”
41014063	Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia yatandula enguwo yaae na awoola otino , “ Tuagarraki omuwoni wundi kandi ?
41014064	Ee , aweene muema okumuwurra na aifwanania ni Katonda . Inywe muingirizia mutie ku amangʼana gano ? ” Woona waamulowa ni wawoola mbwe asugaane aitwe .
41014065	Awandi waatanika okumufuuzako amate ni wamusiwre amiiso ne ekitambaaya kandi wamukuba ewifunzi . Waamuwuuzia watino , “ Tulageeko amangʼana aga owugambi . ” Nikuemao awarinzi waamutoola watanika okumukuba ewifunzi .
41014066	Ni Petro yawanga na ari ansi mu olwanyi , omulala ku owemirimo awekiala awa Omukangasi omunene owa awoozia yamugiako .
41014067	Yatuukra Petro na aota omurro , amuwarra nikwo amulaga otino , “ Iwue oona owanga ni Yesu Omunazareeti ono . ”
41014068	Ni Petro yalowa asiiriisia na awoola otino , “ Inze ngʼamanyire lwona ngʼampurra ekia owoola ekio . ” Yaema ao agia enze ku ekikulo . Mu enyinga ezio engoko yalagula .
41014069	Owemirimo owekiala oyo yamuwona kandi yalaga awaawanga ni waimeriire ao otino , “ Omuntu ono ari omulala ku iwo ! ”
41014070	Ni Petro kandi yalowa amangʼana ago otino , “ Inze ngʼandi omulala ku iwo . ” Lunyima wutono , awaawanga ni waimeriire ao waamulaga watino , “ Kuwuene ori omulala ku iwo , aeniki ori Omugaliili . ”
41014071	Ni Petro yatanika okuifuuwa omwene na aria endagano na awalaga otino , “ Awiifu , inze namanyire omuntu owa mugamba-gambako ono . ”
41014072	Ao-ao , engoko yalagula olwa okuwiri . Nikuemao Petro yaingirizia kiomo Yesu yamulaga mbwe , “ Engoko ne ekiari okulagula kawiri , ooza okulowa kasatu mbwe ngomanyire . ” Kutio yatuluka na amaziga kandi yarra wululu .
41015001	Kunkio no owuire wukia wutino , Omukangasi omunene owa * awoozia , yaikala na * awagerezi awa endagirra , awakangasi awa awoozia , alala na * awagaaka awa Awayaudi , woona okuwurzania ku ekiina ekia Yesu . Nikuemao waamusiwa wagia wamuta mu amakono aga Pilaato omukangasi owa Awaruumi .
41015002	Omwami Pilaato yamuwuuzia otino , “ Mbwe iwue ni iwue omwami owa * Awayaudi ? ” Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Omwene ni iwue owoorre otio . ”
41015003	Kandi awakangasi awa awoozia waamuingirra ni wamuwoolako amangʼana amangi .
41015004	Okusarigira okwa Yesu kwagera Pilaato amuwuuzia kandi otino , “ Owula ne ekia okairania ? Mberi owurra amangʼana amangi aga wakuwoolako gano ? ”
41015005	Ni Yesu yasarigira kiri , kandi ekio kiagera Pilaato aluguula ino .
41015006	Mu omugomo ogwa * Pasaaka , kwawanga enkola eya omukangasi waawu okuwasiwurra omusiwe omulala owa awantu wamusawire mbwe afumie mu owusiwe .
41015007	Yawangao omusiwe omuwiiwi owaetwanga Barabaasi , owawanga munsi ku okuita omuntu ne erioga riafuma agati eya Awayaudi na awakangasi awa esirikaali eya Awaruumi .
41015008	Awantu awangi waagia ku Pilaato wamusawa mbwe awasiwurre omuntu omulala kiomo kwawanga enkola yaawu mu omugomo ogwa Pasaaka .
41015009	Pilaato yawawuuzia mbwe , “ Muagala mbasiwurre omuntu oieta mbwe Omwami owa Awayaudi ono ? ”
41015010	Yawawuuzia otio aeniki yamanya geeza mbwe iyari nirio eriagera awakangasi awa awoozia ni wamuira emberi waae .
41015011	Na awakangasi awa awoozia waalaga awantu mbwe walage Pilaato awasiwurre Barabaasi aa okusiwula Yesu .
41015012	Pilaato kandi yawawuuzia otino , “ Katio nkole entie no omuntu owa mueta mbwe omwami owa Awayaudi ono ? ”
41015013	Waamuirania no omwoyo ogwa kungulu watino , “ * Muwambe ku omusalaaba ! ” Pilaato yawawuuzia mbwe , “ Kolaki ? Niki ekia akorre ekisugre no olumbe ? ” Ni iwo waaogerera wukalu okukira ni wawoola mbwe , “ Muwambe ku * omusalaaba ! ”
41015014	Pilaato yawawuuzia otino , “ Kolaki awiifu , ekiwi ekia akorre niki ? ” Ni iwo waagia emberi ni waogerera wukaalu okukira watino , “ Muwambe ku omusalaaba ! ”
41015015	Kutio Pilaato yawasiwurra Barabaasi , na ari no okuagala mbwe aomerezie omurima ogwa awantu awo . Yasikirra mbwe Yesu akubwe enkowa , nikuemao amuta mu amakono gaawu okugia okuwambwa ku omusalaaba .
41015016	Awa-iiye awo waatoola Yesu waira mu ekambi yaawu kandi wakumia awa-iiye awangi waaza omwo .
41015017	Waavuula Yesu enguwo ziae wamuingizizia enguwo endiire enzakanyu , nikwo waazinga engata eya amawua wamuteera ku omutwe ki ekigudu ekia owuyaayi .
41015018	Waatanika okumusekera ni wamusuusia ni wamulaga watino , “ Oikaziwue , omwami owa Awayaudi ? ”
41015019	Waamukuba omutwe ne ekiti ekia ekituutu kangi ni wamufuuzako amate ku owueni . Awandi waamukubra amasigamo ansi ni wamu-aa owuti ki omwami .
41015020	Olwa waamala okumusuusia otio , waamuvuulako enguwo endiire eyo , wamuingizizia enguwo ziae ezia eyawanga nazio . Nikuemao waafuma nae okugia okumuwamba ku omusalaaba .
41015021	Ni waafumanga ni wagia , waagaana omuntu wundi , oetwa Simioni owa Kureene , owawanga swawu Aleksanda ni Ruufo , na aema olugendo enze na aingira ku omugizi ogwo . Waamunigirizia okuginga omusalaaba ogwa Yesu .
41015022	Waaira Yesu asi aa-etwa mbwe Goligootha , ( erilagana mbwe asi aa Ekiyanga ekia omutwe ) .
41015023	Waatoola edivaai ezoganiiwue no omuti omululu wa-aa Yesu , ni yalowa okuginywa .
41015024	Olwa waamala okumuwamba ku omusalaaba , waagawana enguwo ziae ni wakuba ensiiti , okumanya ekia omuntu ki omuntu asugaane atoole .
41015025	Waamuwamba ku omusalaaba enyinga isatu ezia kunkio .
41015026	Ibaawu riateewua ku omusalaaba kungulu erijojerweko amangʼana aga yaingirrwa nago agaawoolanga mbwe : omwami owa awayaudi .
41015027	Waamuwamba na awasakuzi wawiri , omulala nyakukono kwae okusaaza , no owundi nyakukono okumosi .
41015028	Kutio amangʼana aga Katonda gaatuuka kuwuene .
41015029	Awawitangira waamurigizra amanyego , eno ni watenzia emitwe giawu ni wamulaga watino , “ Iwue owazanga okuona * ekaalu kandi ogiomboke ku amiire asatu ,
41015030	nyingeeno inunulako omwene kato ! Ika ansi oeme ku omusalaaba ! ”
41015031	Nintio lwona awagerezi awa endagirra alala na awakangasi awa awoozia woona waamurigizra amangʼana ni wawoola watino , “ Mbwe yanunula awandi , ni omwene ngaesa okuinunula .
41015032	Katio * Kristo , Omwami owa Awayaudi , aikeko ansi aeme ku omusalaaba , kugere tuwone kandi tuganye nae . ” Awantu awaawambwa nae woona waamurigizra amanyego .
41015033	Olwa kwatuuka enyinga ezia mukaaga , ekierema kia-amba ekialo kiona nawuno kutuuka enyinga ezia kienda .
41015034	Ni ziawanga ampi okutuuka enyinga kienda , Yesu yarra no omwoyo ogwa kungulu na awoola otino , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabakithaani ? ” erilagana mbwe , “ Katonda wange , Katonda wange , ondekere kolaki ? ”
41015035	Olwa awandi ku awantu awaawanga ni waimeriire ao waawurra otio , waawoola mbwe , “ Owuo mpao aeta Eliija . ”
41015036	Omuntu omulala yasomoka agia atoola amalwa amalulu pe aingiziamo esiponji kandi agifumuta ku ekiti , agiira ku omunwa ogwa Yesu mbwe aganywe . Yalaga awiina waae otino , “ Mureke tuwoneko ne Eliija aaza okuuza amutoole ku omusalaaba okwo , amuisie ansi . ”
41015037	Yesu yarra no omwoyo oguri kungulu , nikwo yakewa enkolo .
41015038	Ao-ao , epasia eya ekaalu yatanduka aa kawiri , okuemera kungulu paka ansi .
41015039	Olwa omukangasi owa awa-iiye , owawanga na aimeriire emberi na awarra Yesu , yawona ewiaikola ni Yesu akeweka enkolo , yawoola otino , “ Kuwuene omuntu ono kane yawanga Omuzia owa Katonda ! ”
41015040	Awakazi woona waawanga ao ni wawona ewiaikolanga , ni waimeriire ale . Ku awakazi awo waawangao Saloome , Maaria omwala owa Eumagidaala , ni Maaria ngʼinwawu Yakoobo , wamwawu Yoose omutono .
41015041	Ni waawanga mu ekialo ekia Galiili , awakazi wasatu wano waaweeranga nae kandi waamukorranga emirimo . Awakazi wandi awangi awaaza nae ni waema Yerusaleemu woona waawanga ao .
41015042	Olwa kwatuuka igulo , olwa Emirimo Itaanu ,
41015043	omuntu wundi oetwa Yoseefu owaemanga ku omugizi ogwa Arimathea , kandi owawanga omulala ku awagaaka awa oluwuga otiirwe ino , yakola owusiani agia ku Pilaato amusawa omuwiri ogwa Yesu agie aawre . Omuntu ono oona yawanga na arindirra okuuza okwa * Owuami owua Katonda .
41015044	Pilaato yaluguula ino olwa yawurra mbwe Yesu amiire okufwa , kutio yaeta omukangasi owa awa-iiye okumuwuuzia ni Yesu yafwa kale .
41015045	Olwa Omukangasi owa-iiye yamulaga mbwe amiire okufwa , Pilaato yaganya mbwe Yoseefu atoole omuwiri ogwa Yesu .
41015046	Yoseefu yagula enguwo nikwo agia aisia omuwiri ogwa Yesu ansi okuema ku omusalaaba . Yaguwasaania mu enguwo eyo , nikwo aguingizia mu iwuuta eriawanga ni rimiire okuawua mu iwaale . Nikuemao yagalangasia oguwaale omusumba aigala nagwo omunwa ogwa iwuuta erio .
41015047	Maaria omwala owa Eumagidaala ni Maaria ngʼinwawu Yoose waawona aa yateewua .
41016001	No owuire owua * Sabato wuamala okuwita , Maaria omwala owa Eumagidaala , Saloome ni Maaria ngʼinwawu Yakoobo waagula amavuta agawunya esaami kugere wagie wawake nago omuwiri ogwa Yesu .
41016002	Kunkio nyanga olwa omudiira ogwa okuwiri , ne enyanga efuma , awakazi wano waafuma wagia ku ekiwaga ekia Yesu .
41016003	Waaiwuuzia aweene ku engira ni wagia watino , “ Naanu katio ogia okutugalangasizia oguwaale guria gueme ku omunwa ogwa ekiwaga ? ”
41016004	Olwa waatuuka ao wawarra , waawona oguwaale ogwo ni gwawanga ni gumiire okugalangasiwua guema ku iwuuta . Ni gwawanga oguwaale omusumba .
41016005	Olwa waaingira mu owuina , waawona omuntu oiwooye enguwo enzeru zere na aikaale nyakukono okusaaza . Okwo kwagera owuti wuawa-amba ino .
41016006	Omuntu oyo yawalaga otino , “ Mutatia . Manyire mbwe muagala Yesu Omunazareeti * owawambwa ku omusalaaba oria . Amiire okuziuka , awula ano . Muwone asi aa waawanga ni wamuteere .
41016007	Ni mugie , mulage Petro na awalonzi waae wandi mbwe amiire okukangata agiire Galiili , kandi mugia okumutuukra eyo kiomo yawalaga . ”
41016008	Awakazi awo waafuma enze warumuka ni waema ku ekiwaga ao . Owuti wuawa-amba aa awulao owa waagamba-gamba nae ku engira ni wagia .
41016009	Olwa Yesu yamala okuziuka , kunkio nyanga olwa omudiira ogwa okuwiri , yafumira Maaria omwala owa Eumagidaala , owa yawanga na afumiizieko * ewikeeno musamvu .
41016010	Yagia alaga awantu awa Yesu yawanga nawo , awaawanga ni wamurra ni wari no owululu owungi .
41016011	No olwa waawurra omukazi oyo na awoola mbwe Yesu ari omulamu kandi mbwe amuwuine na amiiso , waalowa amangʼna ago wasiriisia mbwe no owuweeyi .
41016012	Lunyima Yesu kandi yafumira awalonzi waae wawiri ku engira , mu engira egawuuke ni wagia ku omugizi gundi .
41016013	Awalonzi waae wawiri wano waairana wuangu-wuangu walaga awiina waawu ekingʼana kino . Ni woona waalowa amangʼana ago .
41016014	Owutuukre , yafumira awalonzi waae ikumi ni mulala woona ni waikaale ni waria ku emeesa . Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Ne ekintu ekiwiiwi ino mbwe mukiawula no okuganya , kandi mwalowere okuwa no okuganya ku amangʼana aga mumiire okulagwa na awamiire okumbona ni miire okuziuka . ”
41016015	Owuire wundi Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Mugie mu ekialo kiona mugie mulanzizie awantu woona amangʼana amalootu .
41016016	Oweere na okuganya kandi yabatiiswa , arituukra owulamu owutariwua . No olowere okuwa no okuganya ku amangʼana ago , ekiina kirimukira .
41016017	Wino niwio ewiriwa ewilagano ku awantu awariwa no okuganya ku inze ; warifumia ewikeeno ne eriina riange , wariwoola eminwa egigawuke-gawuuke egia watamanyire ,
41016018	wariamba enzoka ni ngaziriwaluma , lwona ni wanywere owutwa owuita awantu , ngawuriwaita kandi warita amakono gaawu ku awalwire , na awalwire warilama . ”
41016019	Olwa Yesu yamala okugamba-gamba nawo otio , yatoolwa aniiniwua ku igulu , aa yagia aikaale nyakukono okusaaza okwa * Omwami Katonda .
41016020	Awalonzi waae waagia walanzia amangʼana aga Katonda mu ekialo kiona kandi Yesu yawa-aa amaani mu emirimo giawu giona . Amankono aga Katonda yakola nawo , gaawa ekilago ku awantu ku amangʼana amalootu aga waalanzia .
42001001	Omukangasi otiirwe Tiofiila , awantu awangi awamiire okukalawana okujoja ku ewintu ewimiire okuikola agati iifu ano .
42001002	Wamiire okujoja amangʼana amalala aga ifwe twona twalagwa na awantu awasooka okugawona na amiiso ni gaikola kandi awaakorra Katonda mu okugalanzizia awantu .
42001003	Kutio , mbona mbwe kulootu noona nkujojere amangʼana gano mu engira ewurikana aeniki omwene miire okugalondorezia geeza okuemera mu owutanikro ,
42001004	kugere omanye owuene wuona owuri ku amangʼana goona aga omiire okugererwa .
42001005	Mu amiire aga * Eroode yawanga omwami owa Yudeea , yawangao * omuozia owaetwanga mbwe Zakaria , owawanga mu owuasio owua owulala owua awoozia owuaetwanga Abiija . Mukaae yaetwanga mbwe Elizabeethi , omwala owa awa Aruuni .
42001006	Woona wawiri waawanga awigolovu emberi wa Katonda , kandi waarinda * ensikirra ne endagirra ziona ezia Katonda aa wataterera .
42001007	Ni waawulanga omwana aeniki Elizabeethi yawanga omugumba , kandi woona wawiri waawanga awantu awakulu .
42001008	Owuire wulala ni Zakaria yawanga na akola emirimo egia owuozia emberi wa Katonda mu owuasio owua owulala wuawu ,
42001009	yalowolwa ne ensiiti na awoozia awiina waae , nikulondokana ne enkola ezia emirimo egia owuozia , okuingira mu ekaalu eya Omwami okusamba * owubaani .
42001010	Ne enyinga ezia okusamba owubaani wuatuuka , awantu woona awaaikumia okusawa , waasawiranga enze .
42001011	* Enyankoi owa Katonda yafumira Zakaria aimerra nyakukono okusaaza okwa emeesa eya okusamba owubaani .
42001012	Olwa Zakaria yamuwona , yazinduka amasaai kandi owuti wuamuamba .
42001013	Ne enyankoi yamulaga otino , “ Zakaria , otatia . Katonda amiire okuwurra okusawa kwao , kandi mukaao Elizabeethi aaza okuiwula omwana owekizia , omuluke eriina Yowaana .
42001014	“ Aaza okugera owone geeza kandi owe omusangaavu , kandi awantu awangi wariwa ne ekisangaalo ku okuiwulwa kwae ,
42001015	aeniki ariwa omuntu omukaate emberi wa Katonda . Na ataaza yanywa amalwa nakuwa ewintu ewilulu ewitowookwe ; kandi aaza okuizuziwua no * Omwoyo Omweru , namba na akiari mu enda eya ngʼinwae .
42001016	“ Arigera Awaisraeli awangi wairane ku * Omwami Katonda waawu .
42001017	Arikangata emberi wa Omwami na ari na amaani aga Omwoyo Omweru kiomo Eliija . Arigalusia emioyo egia waaswawu awaana okugonzia awaana waawu ; kandi origera awa emitwe emikalu okuwurra amangʼana aga owuganga aga awalongoole , kugere waikagre okuingizia Omwami . ”
42001018	Ni Zakaria yawuuzia enyankoi otino , “ Ekiesa okundaga mbwe ewintu wino wiriikola niki ? Aeniki inze ndi omuntu mukulu , kandi mukange oona ari ne emiaka emiera . ”
42001019	Nikuemao , enyankoi yamuirania otino , “ Inze ni * Gabrieli , * omutumwa okola emberi owa Katonda ; kandi ntumrwe okugamba-gamba ni iwue ni nkureetra amangʼana amageni amalootu gano .
42001020	Kutio , manya mbwe ooza okuwa omurimba otagamba-gamba nawuno kutuuke owuire owua ewintu wino wiiza okuikola , aeniki ngokaganya na amangʼana gange gano agaaza okuikola owuire wuago . ”
42001021	Ku enyinga ezio , awantu awaasawanga enze awo waarindanga Zakaria ni waaluguula ekiagera na akinda ino mu ekaalu munsi otio .
42001022	Olwa Zakaria yafuma enze , ngakaesanga okugamba-gamba . Kuno kwagera wamanya mbwe awuine owusasuko mu ekaalu ; aeniki yawalagirizianga ewintu mala na amakono ni ngakanawula ekingʼana .
42001023	Ne enyinga ezia owuasio owua okukola mu ekaalu ziawua , Zakaria yairana engo waae .
42001024	Lunyima , mukaae Elizabeethi ya-amba isaai kandi yaiwisa mu enyumba ku emienzi itaanu na atafuma enze . Yawoola otino ,
42001025	“ Katonda nio onkoriire geeza otino . Mwakuuno ambariire no owusiza wuae kandi antoorreko ensuuko ezia owugumba emberi wa awantu . ”
42001026	Ne Elizabeethi yawanga ni isaai eria emienzi mukaaga , Katonda yatuma enyankoi Gabrieli ku omugizi ogwa Nazareeti , mu ekitemo ekia Galiili .
42001027	Yagia ku omwala omugima oetwa Maaria , owawanga no owuiko owua okukwezana ni Yoseefu , owaemanga mu ekiriango ekia Omwami Daudi .
42001028	Enyankoi oyo yamugiako amulaga otino , “ Oikaziwue , iwue omwala omusereke . Omwami ari ni iwue kandi aomereerwe ni iwue ! ”
42001029	Maaria yainyaasia mu omwoyo gwae ino ku amangʼana ago kandi yaiwuuzia mu amaingirizio gaae ekia amakeezio ago gaalagananga .
42001030	Enyankoi oyo yamulaga otino , “ Maaria , otatia , aeniki Katonda ari omusiza ni iwue .
42001031	Kutio , wona ! Ooza okuamba isaai kandi oiwule omwana owekizia kandi orimuluka mbwe Yesu .
42001032	Ariwa omuntu omukaate , kandi arietwa mbwe Omuzia owa Katonda omunene ; kandi Omwami Katonda arimuta ku entewe eya owuami owua guukwa waae Daudi .
42001033	Ariwa omwami owa awiizukulu awa Yakoobo ku emiigo emiera egiiza kandi owuami wuae ngawuriwua yawa ! ”
42001034	Maaria yawuuzia enyankoi otino , “ Kino kiesa okuikola kitie , ni inze nkiari omwala omugima okiari okuwa alala no omusaaza ? ”
42001035	Enyankoi yamuirania otino , “ Omwoyo Omweru aaza okukuuzako kandi amaani aga Katonda ori kungulu okukira gaaza okukusanikira . Kutio omwana owa ooza okuiwulwa oyo arietwa mbwe Omweru , Omuzia owa Katonda .
42001036	Namba Elizabeethi , omuganda waao , oona aaza okuwa no omwana kukawa mbwe ari omukiire . Kandi iye owaetwanga omugumba nyingeeno ari ne enda eya emienzi mukaaga .
42001037	Aeniki kiwulao ekiesa okukira Katonda okukola . ”
42001038	Maaria yairania otino , “ Inze ndi * omukurumu owa Omwami Katonda , kandi nganyire ekintu-ukintu ekia aagala mbwe kinyiikoleko . ” Nikuemao enyankoi yagia amureka .
42001039	Nikuemao , Maaria yasiwa emisigo wuangu afuma okugia ku omugizi oguri mu ekialo ekia ewigiri ewia Yudeea ,
42001040	aingira ku omugizi ogwa Zakaria agia akeezia Elizabeethi .
42001041	Olwa Elizabeethi yawurra amakeezio aga Maaria otino , omwana yawaaya mu enda yaae kandi Elizabeethi yaizuziwua no Omwoyo Omweru .
42001042	Yagamba-gamba no omwoyo ogwa kungulu na awoola otino , “ Iwue osereekwe agati eya awakazi wandi , kandi omwana owa ooza okuiwula oona asereekwe !
42001043	Ni inze nsereekwe aeniki ngʼinwawu Omwami wange aazre okumbona .
42001044	Aeniki olwa mpuriire-uwurra amakeezio gaao otino , omwana ori munda yange aduma-duumre ne ekisangaalo .
42001045	Osereekwe iwue ku okuganya mbwe ewintu ewia Katonda akulagre wiiza okuikola ! ”
42001046	Nikuemao Maaria yawoola otino , “ Omwoyo gwange gutondowola Omwami Katonda .
42001047	Mu owulamu wuange ndi ne ekisangaalo ku Katonda omununuzi wange ,
42001048	aeniki amiire okunyingirizia inze omukurumu waae ori ansi ! Okutanikra reero , amakula goona gaaza okunyeta omusereke ,
42001049	aeniki Katonda owa amaani goona amiire okunkorra ewintu ewikaate . Eriina riaae rieru !
42001050	Alagana owusiza ku awantu awamuere owuti , okuemera ku ikula rino okugia ku ikula rindi .
42001051	Amiire okukola ewinene na agoloole okukono kwae okwa amaani na ataanyia awaitumbula mu amaingirizio gaawu .
42001052	Yategula awaami awa amambala nawuno awatoola ku entewe ziawu , na aginga kungulu awantu awaiisiizie ansi .
42001053	Yaigusia awari ne enzala ne ewintu ewilootu , na awanyazi arumusia wagia amakono masa .
42001054	Amiire okutunzia omukurumu waae Israeli , na alonda owusiza wuae ,
42001055	kiomo yawoorra waaguukwa wiifu , Abraamu alala na awiizukulu waae , mbwe arikola amiire goona . ”
42001056	Kutio , Maaria yamenya ne Elizabeethi ku emienzi egikaera isatu nikwo airana owaawu .
42001057	Olwa enyinga ezia Elizabeethi ezia okuigawula ziatuuka , yaiwula omwana owekizia .
42001058	Awamenyere nae ampi na awaganda waae waawurra kiomo Omwami amiire okumukorra owusiza owukaate , kandi woona waasangaala nae alala .
42001059	Olwa owuire owua munaane wuatuuka waaza okuira omwana * enyangu , kandi waagalanga mbwe wamuluke swae Zakaria .
42001060	Ni ngʼinwae yawairania otino , “ Yaaya ! Asugaane aetwe Yowaana ! ”
42001061	Ni iwo waamuirania watino , “ Awulao omuntu mu oluganda lwinyu ori ne endukwa eyo . ”
42001062	Nikuemao waawuuzia swae na amakono ni wamuagalako eriina eria akaagala omwana oyo alukwe .
42001063	Yawasawa iwaale eria akujojako , kandi yajoja mbwe “ Eriina riae ni Yowaana . ” Kandi okwo kwagera awantu waluguula ino .
42001064	Ao-ao , omunwa gwae gwaiguka kandi olurimi lwae lusiwuka , nawuno atanika okugamba-gamba na atondowola Katonda .
42001065	Kandi , owuti wua-amba awantu woona awaawanga ni wamenyere nawo ampi . Awantu woona awa ekialo kiona ekia ewigiri ewia Yudeea waagamba-gambanga ku amangʼana gano .
42001066	Omuntu-umuntu owawurra amangʼana gano yagaluguula na aiwuuzia otino , “ Omwana ono aaza okuwa omuntu ofwana otie ? ” Aeniki , kuri kuwuene mbwe amaani aga Omwami Katonda gari nae .
42001067	Swae Zakaria , na aizuziwua no Omwoyo Omweru , yawoola amangʼana agaamuemera ku Katonda otino :
42001068	“ Atondowolwe Omwami , Katonda owa Awaisraeli , aeniki amiire okuuza okutoola awantu waae mu amakono aga omuzigu .
42001069	Amiire okutureetra omununuzi ori na amaani okuema mu enyumba eya omukurumu waae Daudi .
42001070	Kiomo yawoola okuwitra ku * awagambi waae aweeru okuemera kale mbwe :
42001071	Aritununula okuema ku awazigu wiifu kandi okuema ku amakono aga awaturegere woona .
42001072	Arilagana owusiza ku waaguukwa wiifu kandi ari-ingirizia * endagano yaae enzeru eya yakola nawo .
42001073	Aaza okutuusia endagano eya yaifuuwira soifu Abraamu .
42001074	Aaza okutu-aa amaani aga okumukorra ni tuwula owuti , na amiire okututoola mu amakono aga awazigu wiifu .
42001075	Kandi tuuza okuwa aweeru kandi awigolovu emberi waae , amiire goona aga owulamu wuifu .
42001076	Ni iwue , omwana wange , ooza okuetwa omugambi owa Katonda omunene ; aeniki orikangata emberi owa Omwami okuta emioyo egia awantu okuwa amankaga okumuingizia .
42001077	Ooza oku-aa awantu waae amaganga aga okumanya owuinunuzi owutuukrwa ni warekeerwe owuoni wuawu .
42001078	Okuwitra ku owusiza owua olugonzi olwa Katonda iifu , aaza okureeta owueru owua enyanga owua owuinunuzi wumurike , ni wuema ku igulu ,
42001079	ku awamenyere mu ekierema kandi awari mu ekiiruuzia ekia olumbe ; kandi okulagirizia amagulu giifu ku engira eya owuolu . ”
42001080	Omwana oyo yakoma kandi awa omukalangufu mu omuwiri ni mu omwoyo ; kandi yamenya mu ekeewa nawuno kutuuka afuma awonekana owuyanga ku Awaisraeli .
42002001	Mu amiire ago kwawa mbwe Omwami * Kaisaari Agusto yafumia amangʼana mbwe awari mu ekialo ekia Rooma woona wawalwe .
42002002	Kuno nikwo okwawanga okuwalwa okwa awantu okwasooka ni Kwirinaasi yawanga omukangasi owa ekialo ekitono ekia Siiria .
42002003	Kandi omuntu ki omuntu yagia okuwalwa ku omugizi omunene ogwa ekialo ekia waaguukwa waawu .
42002004	Kutio Yoseefu oona yaema Nazareeti mu ekialo ekia Galiili agia Yudeea ku omugizi ogwa Bethleemu ogwa Daudi yawanga na amenyeremo , aeniki yawanga owa enyumba no owuiwulane owua Daudi .
42002005	Waagia eyo alala ni Maaria , owayawanga na akorre nae owuiko owua okukwezana , kandi owawanga na alwire ni isaai mu enyinga ezio .
42002006	Ni waawanga eyo , waaizukira ne enyinga ezia Maaria ezia okuigawula ni zituukre ,
42002007	kandi yaiwula omwana waae owa kuluweri owekizia . Yamuwasania mu enguwo kandi amuta mu ekituwa ekia emiandu giriiramo , aeniki iwaga riawulangao mu amayumba aga awageni .
42002008	Ni waawangao awaayi awa amagondi awaawanga ni wamenyere mu ekiayiro ekia ampi ao , ni warinda emiandu giawu owuire .
42002009	* Enyankoi owa Omwami yawafumira kalala kandi owunene owua Omwami wuawala wuwasunguuzia . Okwo kwagera owuti owunene ino wuwa-amba .
42002010	Ne enyankoi oyo yawalaga otino , “ Mutatia aeniki mbareetiire amangʼana amalootu agareeta owusangaavu owunene ku awantu woona .
42002011	Reero , Omwami * Kristo , Omununuzi iinyu , aiwuulwe ku omugizi omunene ogwa Omwami Daudi .
42002012	Kino nikio ekiiza okuwa ekilago ku inywe : Muuza okutuukra omwana owasaniiwue mu enguwo kandi agonre mu ekituwa ekia emiandu giriiramo . ”
42002013	Kalala , omuganda ogwa enyankoi awa Katonda awangi waafuma wawa ne enyankoi oyo ni watondowola Katonda kandi ni waawoola watino ,
42002014	“ Owunene wuwe ni Katonda ori kungulu ino , kandi owuolu wuwe ku awantu awaomerezia Katonda ku ekialo . ”
42002015	Olwa enyankoi awo waawareka ni wairana ku igulu , awaayi awo waawoola agati yaawu watino , “ Mutugieko Bethleemu , tugie tuwone ekia * Omwami Katonda atulagre mbwe kiikorre eyo kino . ”
42002016	Kutio waafuma wuangu-wuangu wagia waatuukra Yoseefu ni Maaria , alala no omwana ekingʼengʼe na agonre mu ekituwa ekia emiandu giriiramo .
42002017	Olwa waamala okumuwona waalanzia amangʼana aga waalagwa ku omwana oyo ,
42002018	kandi woona awaawawurra waaluguula ino amangʼana aga awaayi awo waawalaga .
42002019	Ni Maaria iye yawiika amangʼana gano goona mu omwoyo gwae kandi yagaingirizianga .
42002020	Awaayi awo wairana ni watondowola Katonda kandi ni wamu-aa owunene ku ewintu wiona ewia waawurra kandi wawona , ewiawanga mala kiomo waawanga ni wamiire okulagwa .
42002021	Olwa owuire owua munaane owua okuira omwana * enyangu wuatuuka , yaeewua eriina Yesu , eria enyankoi yamuluka ni isaai riae rikiari okuambwa .
42002022	Na amiire aga okuieruyia okwa ngʼina omwana nikulondokana ne endagirra eya Muusa , gaawua , Yoseefu ni Maaria waagia Yerusaleemu okufumia omusango . Waagia no omwana Yesu okumuta emberi wa Omwami Katonda ,
42002023	ni walonda * ensikirra ezia Omwami Katonda eziwoola otino , “ Omwana owekizia osookere mu enda ari omweru otengeekeerwe Omwami Katonda . ”
42002024	Lwona waagia okufumia omusango nikulondokana ne endagirra eya Omwami Katonda ewoola mbwe : omuntu afumia amaemba-emba awiri nakuwa ewiana ewia ewigimbamvula wiwiri .
42002025	Yawangao omuntu Yerusaleemu owaetwanga Simoni , omuntu omuigolovu kandi oambre amangʼana aga Omwami Katonda . Yarindirranga okuwona owuire owua Awaisraeli waazanga okununulwa , kandi * Omwoyo Omweru yamuwangako .
42002026	Yawanga na amiire okulagwa no Omwoyo Omweru mbwe ngarifwa na atawuine Kristo , Omununuzi owa Omwami Katonda yaifuuwa okutuma .
42002027	Yakangatrwa no Omwoyo Omweru mala agia aingira mu olwanyi olwa * ekaalu . Olwa awiiwuzi awa omwana Yesu waaingira nae mu ekaalu okumukorra kiomo enkola ezia endagirra ziagalanga ,
42002028	Simoni yamuginga mu amakono gaae atanika okutondowola Katonda na awoola otino ,
42002029	“ Omwami omunene , omiire okukola kiomo waaifuuwa . Katio oesa wandeka inze * omukurumu waao ngone no owuolu ,
42002030	aeniki miire okuwona , omuntu ooza okununula awantu , na amiiso gange .
42002031	Ee , owuinunuzi owua omiire okureeta kandi ota emberi owa awantu woona .
42002032	Iye nio owueru owuuza okusasurra namba awantu awatari * Awayaudi engira yaao kandi aaza okureetra awantu waao Awaisraeli owunene owukuemako . ”
42002033	Ewintu ewia awiiwuzi awa omwana waawurra ni Simioni awoola ku omwana waawu wiawa-amba eminwa .
42002034	Nikuemao , Simoni yawasereka kandi alaga Maaria ngʼina Yesu otino , “ Omwana ono arigera Awaisraeli awangi wari-isiwua ansi , na awandi wariniiniwua kungulu . Ariwa ekilago ekiema ku Katonda ekia awantu warilowa ni wagamba-gambako uwiiwi ,
42002035	kugere amaingirizio agari mu emioyo egia awantu gamanyike . Namba iwue oona , oriwa no omwoyo omululu kiomo omuntu owa omwambe gufumuute guingira mu enkolo munsi . ”
42002036	Lwona yawangao * omugambi owekikazi owa Katonda owaetwanga Aana , omwala owa Fanueli , owa ekiriango ekia Aasa . Yawanga na akiriiye katio , ni yamenya ni iwuae mala ku emiaka musamvu giengʼene .
42002037	Nikuemao iwuae yafwa asigala omukazi omufwire nawuno awa ne emiaka amakumi munaane ni ine . Ngakaemanga mu ekaalu , ni yakorra Katonda owuire no omuwasu , na asawa kandi na asiwa okuria aa ataria .
42002038	Yawaazako ampi mu enyinga ezio atanika okuiranizia Katonda otioo na agamba-ngamba ku omwana Yesu , ku awantu awa Yerusaleemu woona awaarindirranga okununulwa mu amakono aga awazigu .
42002039	Ni waamala okukola ewintu wiona kiomo endagirra eya Omwami yaagalanga , Yoseefu ni Maaria wairana Galiili ku omugizi gwawu oguetwa Nazareeti .
42002040	Kandi omwana oyo yakoma awa omukalangufu . Yaizuziwua na amaganga amangi kandi owusiza owua Katonda wuamuwangako .
42002041	Omwaka ki omwaka awiiwuzi waae waagianga Yerusaleemu mu omugomo ogwa * Pasaaka .
42002042	Olwa yawanga ne emiaka ikumi ni iwiri , waagia nae nikulondokana ne enkola eya omugomo ogwo .
42002043	Olwa omugomo gwawua kandi awiiwuzi waae wairananga engo , omuzia Yesu iye yasigala enyima Yerusaleemu na awiiwuzi waae watamanyire .
42002044	Waagenda-genda ku owuire owulala ni waingirizia mbwe yawanga agati eya awalugendwa . Lunyima , waatanika okumuagala mu awaganda na awiiko waawu ,
42002045	ni ngawakamutuukra . Enkio walwo waatanika olugendo olwa okuirana Yerusaleemu , ni wamuagala .
42002046	Owuire owua okusatu waamutuukra mu olwanyi olwa ekaalu , na aikaale agati ya * awagerezi awa endagirra na awategerezia kandi na awawuuzia embuuzia .
42002047	Awantu woona awaamuwurra waaluguula ino kiomo amanyire ewintu ewingi kandi kiomo yairanianga embuuzia .
42002048	Olwa awiiwuzi waae waamuwona waaluguula . Ngʼinwae yamulaga otino , “ Mwana wange , ekigera no otukoriire otino niki ? Inze ni swao tumiire okunyaka-nyaaka ino ni tukuagala . ”
42002049	Ni iye yawawuuzia otino , “ Munyagalenga kolaki ? Na mukawanga ni mumanyire mbwe nsugaane mbe mu enyumba eya Soifu ? ”
42002050	Ni iwo ngawakamanya ekia yawalaganga .
42002051	Nikuemao , yaika nawo Nazareeti kandi yamenya nawo no owuti geeza . Ni ngʼinwae yawiika kandi a-amba ewintu wino mu omwoyo gwae .
42002052	Kandi Yesu yakoma mu amaganga kandi mu omuwiri gwona ; yagonziwua na awantu kandi ni Katonda yoona .
42003001	Gwawanga omwaka ogwa ikumi ni itaanu mu owukangasi owua * Kaisaari Tiberiasi . Pontias Pilaato yawanga omukangasi owa ekitemo ekia Yudeea , ne * Eroode yawanga omukangasi owa ekitemo ekia Galiili . Wamwawu waae Piliipo nio owawanga omukangasi owa Iturea ni Trakonitiisi , ni Lisaania yawanga omukangasi owa Abileene .
42003002	Anaasi ni Kaifa niwo awaawanga awakangasi awa * awoozia . Amiire ago amangʼana aga Katonda gaazra Yowaana omuzia owa Zakaria na ari mu ekeewa .
42003003	Yagia mu ewialo wiona ewiri ampi no oluuzi olwa Yordaani , na alanzizia awantu mbwe wagaluke wareke amawi , wabatiiswe kugere Katonda awarekere owuoni wuawu .
42003004	Kiomo Katonda yawoola mu amangʼana agari mu ebuuki eya * Omugambi Isaaya otino : “ Omwoyo ogwa omuntu oetana mu ekeewa otino , ‘ Mulongre Omwami engira , mumugololre engira ewe enyigolovu .
42003005	Amiina goona gawugrwe , ewigiri wiona wirimwe wiike ansi . Engira eziigodre zigololwe , kandi anyenyeevu aterereziwue .
42003006	Kandi awantu woona waaza okuwona owuinunuzi owua Katonda . ’ ”
42003007	Yowaana yalaga omuganda ogwa awantu awamuuzako kugere awabatiise otino , “ Inywe awaana awa enzoka wano ! Owasiagiizie mbwe mumizule okuswawukwa no okusu okungi okuuza naanu ?
42003008	Muamie ensaafu ezia mu enkola , ezilagana geeza mbwe omuntu agaluuke arekere amawi . Ni mutaaza mwaingirizia mbwe muuza mwamizuka ku okuwoola-uwoola mbwe , ‘ Turi geeza aeniki turi awaana awa Abraamu . ’ Mbalaga mbwe Katonda aesa okugalusia amawaale gano gawe awaana awa Abraamu !
42003009	Namba nyingeeno , embasa emiire okuteewua ku isina eria omuti ; kandi omuti ki omuti oguta-amia ensaafu endootu guuza okutemwao nikwo gurigizwe mu omurro . ”
42003010	Omurima ogwo gwamuwuuzia otino , “ Katio tusugaane tukoleki ? ”
42003011	Yowaana yawairania otino , “ Omuntu ori ne enguwo iwiri asugaane agawire omwina waae owula nayo , kandi ori no okuria oona asugaane akole otio . ”
42003012	Awasolozi awa * omusolo awaaza okubatiiswa woona waamuwuuzia watino , “ Omugerezi , ifwe tusugaane tukoleki ? ”
42003013	Yawalaga otino , “ Mutasolozia amangi okukira kiomo kuagalana . ”
42003014	Nikuemao awa-iiye wandi woona waamuwuuzia watino , “ Ni ifwe , tusugaane tukoleki ? ” Yowaana yawairania otino , “ Mutatoola amasendi ku awantu na amaani kandi mutata amangʼana aga owuweeyi ku omuntu . Mureke emisaara giinyu giwasuge ! ”
42003015	Awantu awaarindranga okuuza okwa Omununuzi waaingirizianga mu emioyo giawu mbwe Yowaana oyo nio owawanga * Meesia .
42003016	Yowaana yawairania woona otino , “ Inze mbabatiisa na amanzi . Na ario amuntu omukaate okunkira ooza , omuntu owa ngʼasugre namba okusiwula engoe ezia ewiraato wiae . Iye aaza okuwabatiisa no * Omwoyo Omweru ogwa Katonda kandi no omurro .
42003017	Ari ne ekiseeso kiae mu amakono , ekia aaza okuseesra amaemba mu olwanyi lwae . Emere aaza okuta mu ekiagi , na amakunzo aaza okusamba no omurro ogutazima . ”
42003018	Na amangʼana gandi amangi , Yowaana yaiyemba awantu na awalanzizia amangʼana amalootu .
42003019	No olwa Yowaana yagaania Omwami Eroode ku amangʼana aga Erodiasi muka wamwawu owa yatoola okuwa omukazi waae , kandi ku amawi gandi amangi aga Eroode yakolanga ,
42003020	Eroode yasonga owuwi ku amawi goona aga yakola ago olwa yaingizia Yowaana mu owusiwe .
42003021	Kwawa mbwe , na awantu woona waamala okubatiiswa kandi Yesu oona yaaza abatiiswa , kandi ni yasawanga igulu riaigukao .
42003022	Omwoyo Omweru yaika ku iye mu embonekano eya iemba-emba kandi omwoyo gwaemera ku igulu ogwawoola gutino , “ Iwue ni iwue omuzia wange owa ngonziizie , kandi owa nsangaarre nae . ”
42003023	Yesu yawanga ne emiaka egiera amakumi asatu na atanika emirimo giae . Awantu waingirizianga mbwe yawanga omuzia owa Yoseefu , ni kuwuene yasimuka mu owuiwulane owua Eeli .
42003024	Eeli yawanga omuzia owa Mataat , Mataat yawanga omuzia owa Laawi , Laawi yawanga omuzia owa Melki , Melki yawanga omuzia owa Janaai , Janaai yawanga omuzia owa Yoseefu .
42003025	Yoseefu yawanga omuzia owa Matathiasi , Matathiasi yawanga omuzia owa Amoos , Amoos yawanga omuzia owa Naumi , Naumi yawanga omuzia owa Esli , Esli yawanga omuzia owa Nagaai .
42003026	Nagaai yawanga omuzia owa Maathi , Maathi yawanga omuzia owa Matathiasi , Matathiasi yawanga omuzia owa Semeeni , Semeeni yawanga omuzia owa Yoseeki , Yoseeki yawanga omuzia owa Yooda .
42003027	Yooda yawanga omuzia owa Yoanan , Yoanan yawanga omuzia owa Reesa , Reesa yawanga omuzia owa Zerubabeeli , Zerubabeeli yawanga omuzia owa Seltieli , Seltieli yawanga omuzia owa Neeri .
42003028	Neeri yawanga omuzia owa Melki , Melki yawanga omuzia owa Aadi , Aadi yawanga omuzia owa Kosaam , Kosaam yawanga omuzia owa Elmadaam , Elamdaam yawanga omuzia owa Eeri .
42003029	Eeri yawanga omuzia owa Yoswa , Yoswa yawanga omuzia owa Eliazaari , Eliazaari yawanga omuzia owa Yoriimu , Yoriimu yawanga omuzia owa Mattaat , Mattaat yawanga omuzia owa Laawi .
42003030	Laawi yawanga omuzia owa Simoni , Simoni yawanga omuzia owa Yuuda , Yuuda yawanga omuzia owa Yoseefu , Yoseefu yawanga omuzia owa Yoanaamu , Yoanaamu yawanga omuzia owa Eliakiimu .
42003031	Eliakiimu yawanga omuzia owa Melea , Melea yawanga omuzia owa Meena , Meena yawanga omuzia owa Mataatha , Mataatha yawanga omuzia owa Nathaani , Nathaani yawanga omuzia owa Daudi .
42003032	Daudi yawanga omuzia owa Yeese , Yeese yawanga omuzia owa Obeedi , Obeedi yawanga omuzia owa Boazi , Boazi yawanga omuzia owa Salmooni , Salmooni yawanga omuzia owa Nasooni .
42003033	Nasooni yawanga omuzia owa Aminadaabu , Aminadaabu yawanga omuzia owa Raamu , Raamu yawanga omuzia owa Ezrooni , Ezrooni yawanga omuzia owa Pereezi , Pereezi yawanga omuzia owa Yuuda .
42003034	Yuuda yawanga omuzia owa Yakoobo , Yakoobo yawanga omuzia owa Isaaka , Isaaka yawanga omuzia owa Abraamu , Abraamu yawanga omuzia owa Teera , Teera yawanga omuzia owa Naori .
42003035	Naori yawanga omuzia owa Seruugi , Seruugi yawanga omuzia owa Reeu , Reeu yawanga omuzia owa Peleegi , Peleegi yawanga omuzia owa Ebeer , Ebeer yawanga omuzia owa Seela .
42003036	Seela yawanga omuzia owa Kainaani , Kainaani yawanga omuzia owa Alfaksaadi , Alfaksaadi yawanga omuzia owa Seem , Seem yawanga omuzia owa Noowa , Noowa yawanga omuzia owa Lameeki .
42003037	Lameeki yawanga omuzia owa Methuseela , Methuseela yawanga omuzia owa Enooka , Enooka yawanga omuzia owa Yareedi , Yareedi yawanga omuzia owa Maalaleeli , Maalaleeli yawanga omuzia owa Kainaani .
42003038	Kainaani yawanga omuzia owa Enoosi , Enoosi yawanga omuzia owa Seeth , Seeth yawanga omuzia owa Adaamu , ni Adaamu yawanga omuzia owa Katonda .
42004001	Yesu yaema mu Oluuzi olwa Yordaani na aizuziiwue no * Omwoyo Omweru owamukangatra amuira
42004002	mu ekeewa , aa * Ekikeeno kiamugeezaania ku amiire amakumi ane . Ngakaria ekintu-ukintu ku amiire ago , kandi mu entuuko yago enzala katio yamurianga !
42004003	Ekikeeno kiamulaga kitino , “ No ori Omuzia owa Katonda , laga iwaale rino rigaluke riwe okuria . ”
42004004	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Kujojrwe mu endagano mbwe : ‘ Okuria kwengʼene ngakugera no omuntu awa omulamu . ’ ”
42004005	Ekikeeno kiamuira asi ari kungulu ino kandi kimulaga ewialo wiona ewia owuami owua ku ekialo , kalala ki olumesi .
42004006	Nikuemao kiamulaga kitino , “ Nyiza okuku-aa amaani goona aga owukangasi owua ewialo wino no owunene wuawio wuona , aeniki miire okuwiewua kandi nyesa okuwi-aa omuntu-umuntu kiomo mbwine .
42004007	Kutio , no onyifunamiire kandi ompe owunene , wiona wiiza okuwa ewiao . ”
42004008	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Kujojrwe mu endagano mbwe , ‘ Ifunamira kandi o-ee * Omwami Katonda waao engʼene owunene kandi iye engʼene nio osugaane okorre . ’ ”
42004009	Ekikeeno kiamuira Yerusaleemu , kimuemerezia asi aliire okukira ku enzizi eya * ekaalu , kimulaga kitino , “ No ori Omuzia owa Katonda , eema ano oguluke ogwe ansi .
42004010	Aeniki kujojrwe mu endagano mbwe , ‘ Katonda aaza okusikirra * enyankoi waae wakurinde ,
42004011	kandi waaza okukuginga kungulu kugere otaguunya okugulu ku iwaale . ’ ”
42004012	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Endagano ewoola mbwe , ‘ Otageezaania Omwami Katonda waao . ’ ”
42004013	Olwa Ekikeeno kiamala okugeezaania Yesu mu engira zino ziona , kiamureka nawuno enyinga zindi zituuka .
42004014	Yesu yairana owaawu Galiili na akangatiirwe no Omwoyo Omweru , kandi amangʼana gaaye gailanzia mu ewitemo wiona ewiri ampi ao .
42004015	Yagerera awantu mu amasinagoogi gaawu , kandi awantu woona waamu-aa owunene .
42004016	Yesu yairana owaawu Nazareeti aa yakomera . Owuire owua * Sabato yagia mu * esinagoogi kiomo kwawanga enkola yaae kandi yaimerra okusoma endagano .
42004017	Ebuuki eya * Omugambi Isaaya yateewua mu amakono gaae . Yagisanukula mala atuukra asi ajojrwe otino ,
42004018	“ Omwoyo Omweru ogwa Omwami andimo , kandi amiire * okumbaka amavuta kugere ndanzie amangʼana amalootu ku awataka . Amiire okuntuma okulanzia okusiwulwa okwa awasiwe , kandi mbwe awawuunu wawone , kandi okuta owuyanga awantu awanyaasiwua .
42004019	Kandi okulanzia mbwe amiire aga Omwami aaza okulagana owusiza ku awantu waae gamiire okutuuka . ”
42004020	Nikuemao , yasanikra ebuuki eyo agiiranizia owemirimo owa mu esinagoogi , mala agia aikala ansi okugerera . Awantu woona waamutaako ekiwi ekia amiiso .
42004021	Nikuemao , yatanika okugamba-gamba otino , “ Reero amangʼana gano gatuukre kuwuene kiomo mugawuriire na amatwi giinyu otio . ”
42004022	Woona waamugamba-gambako geeza ni waaluguula amangʼana amalootu aga owusiza agaafumanga mu omunwa gwae . Ni ngawakaganya nae mbwe nio * Meesia , kutio waaiwuuzia watino , “ Kane ono ngʼano omuzia owa Yoseefu ? ”
42004023	Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Kuwuene muuza okundaga emfumo ewoola etino , ‘ Omurezi , irerako omwene ! ’ Lwona muuza okundaga mbwe , ‘ Kolako ku omugizi gwinyu ano ewintu ewia twawuriire mbwe wakola Kapernaumu . ’ ”
42004024	Yagia emberi na awoola otino , “ Mbalaga kuwuene , mbwe omugambi ngaingiziwua mu ekialo kiawu .
42004025	Ni kuwuene mbwe waawangao awakazi awafwire awangi mu ekialo ekia Awaisraeli mu amiire aga Omugambi Eliija , olwa igulu riaigalwao ku emiaka isatu ne enusu kandi enzala enene ya-amba ekialo kiona .
42004026	Ne Eliija ngakatumwa ku iwo woona , ni yatumwa mala ku omukazi omufwire owawanga Zarefaathi mu ekitemo ekia Sidooni .
42004027	Lwona , waawangao awalwire awangi awaalwalanga owugenge mu ekialo ekia Awaisraeli mu amiire aga Omugambi Eliisa , ni woona ngawakalama ku owulwire owuo , ni mala Naamani engʼene owaemanga mu ekialo ekia Siiria . ”
42004028	Awantu woona awaawanga mu esinagoogi enda ziawu ziayia nae ino olwa waawurra amangʼana gano .
42004029	Waaemerrako , wamusindika enze eya omugizi wamuira ku oluwanga olwa ekigiri ekia omugizi ogwo gwaombokwako , kugere wamuluume agwe ansi .
42004030	Ni iye yagenda-genda agati ya omurima ogwo mala agia eziae .
42004031	Yesu yaika agia Kapernaumu , omugizi oguri mu ekitemo ekia Galiili kandi owuire owua Sabato yagereranga awantu .
42004032	Awaawurra engerera yaae gaawa-amba eminwa , aeniki amangʼana gaae gaawanga na amaani .
42004033	Mu esinagoogi omwo yawangao omuntu owawanga ne ekikeeno . Omuntu oyo yarra wukalu otino ,
42004034	“ Otuagalakooki , iwue Yesu Omunazareeti ? Wuno oozre okutumala ? Manyire owa ori , ni iwue Omweru oemere ku Katonda ! ”
42004035	Ni Yesu yasiagizia ekikeeno ekio na awoola otino , “ Sarigira kiri , kandi fuma omuemeko ! ” Nikuemao ekikeeno ekio kiagwisia omuntu oyo ansi emberi waawu , mala kimufumako ni kitamunyarre omuwiri .
42004036	Amangʼana ago ga-amba eminwa egia awantu awaawangao awo woona , kandi waaiwuuzia agati yaawu watino , “ Gano amangʼanaaki gano ? Agamba-gambra namba * ewikeeno ewiwiiwi na amaani no owukire nawuno wiafuma ku awantu . ”
42004037	Kandi amangʼana aga ewintu ewia yakolanga wino gaailanzia gatuuka asi-uasi mu ewialo ewiri ampi ao .
42004038	Yesu yaema mu esinagoogi agia ku omugizi ogwa Simioni . Kwatuukra ni maaziala Simioni agona ku ekitanda no omuwiri guri omuyu le , alwala . Awalonzi waae waamusawa mbwe amutunzie .
42004039	Yesu yagia amuimerrako ampi mala asiagizia owulwire owuo kandi wumureka . Ku enyinga ezio , yalama mala aema atanika okuwa-aa okuria .
42004040	Kutio iguulo , ne enyanga yawanga ne egia okugwamo , awantu woona awaawanga na awalwire awaalwalanga amalwire agagawuke-gawuuke waawareeta ku Yesu , kandi yata amakono gaae ku omuntu ki omuntu na awalamia .
42004041	Ewikeeno wiona wiafuma ku awantu awangi ni wikuula witino , “ Iwue ni iwue Omuzia owa Katonda ! ” Ni iye yawisarigizia , kandi ngakawiganyira okugamba-gamba aeniki wiawanga ni wimanyire mbwe yawanga * Kristo .
42004042	Kunkio ku amagambaazi , Yesu yafuma agia asi andi aa akawa omwene . Awantu waamuagala , kandi olwa waamutuukako ngawakaagalanga mbwe afume awareke .
42004043	Ni iye yawalaga otino , “ Paka ndanzie amangʼana amalootu aga * Owuami owua Katonda mu emigizi gindi giona , aeniki ekio nikio ekiagera ni ntumwa . ”
42004044	Kutio yagia emberi okulanzia mu amasinagoogi agari mu ekialo ekia * Awayaudi .
42005001	Owuire wulala , Yesu yawanga na aimeriire ku ensanyaata eya enyanza eya * Genezereeti , na awantu wamuikumiizieko kandi wawurra amangʼana aga Katonda .
42005002	Yawona amaato awiri ni garekerwe ku ensanyaata ao , na awavuwi aweene waaozianga engoe ziawu .
42005003	Yaingira mu owuato owulala owua Simioni ( owa eriina riae rindi riawanga Petro ) , kandi yamusawa mbwe asindike owuato mu amanzi ampi ni ku ekialo . Nikuemao , yaikala mu owuato kandi yatanika okugerera omurima ogwa awantu na aikaale omwo .
42005004	Olwa Yesu yamala okugamba-gamba na awantu , yalaga Simioni otino , “ Musiawazie owuato mugie ewuziwa mugie mutege engoe ziinyu ziambe emvwa . ”
42005005	Simioni yamuirania otino , “ Omwami , tumiire okukola emirimo emikalu owuire owulamba ni ngatuka-amba emvwa . Ni aeniki ni iwue owoorre otio , ngia okutega engoe . ”
42005006	Olwa waakola watio , wa-amba emvwa enyingi ino aa engoe ziatanika okutanduka .
42005007	Kutio , waaeta awiina waawu awaawanga mu owuato wundi waaze wawatunzie . Olwa waaza , waaizuzia amaato awiri ago ne emvwa du nawuno gawona okuniwa .
42005008	Olwa Simioni Petro yawona ekiaikola kino , yagwa mu amasigamo gaae emberi wa Yesu na amulaga otino , “ Nyemeeko , ogia ale ni inze Omwami . Ndi omuntu omwoni ! ”
42005009	Iye alala na awantu awa yawanga nawo gaawa-amba eminwa olwa waawona emvwa enyingi ezia wa-ambre ,
42005010	kandi nintio lwona awiina waae , Yakoobo ni Yowaana , awazia awa Zebeedi , woona gaawa-amba eminwa . Nikuemao Yesu yalaga Simioni otino , “ Otatia , okuemera reero ooza okuwa omuvuwi owa awantu no owareeta okundonda . ”
42005011	Kutio , waakulula amaato gaawu ku ekialo kandi wareka ewintu wiona wamulonda .
42005012	Ni Yesu yawanga na ari ku omugizi gundi , omuntu olwala owulwire owua owugenge yaaza , kandi olwa yawona Yesu yamwifunamra na amuiyemba otino , “ Omwami , nkusawa mbwe no oganyire , oesa okunyeruyia mbe omweru . ”
42005013	Yesu yagolola okukono kwae amuamba , nikuemao amulaga otino , “ Ee , nganyire . Wa omulamu ! ” Ku enyinga ezio owugenge owuamuwuako .
42005014	Nikuemao Yesu yamusikirra mbwe , “ Otalaga omuntu ekintu ekikuikoriire kino , ni gia oilagane ku * omuozia kandi ofumie omusango ogwa Muusa yasikirra awantu awalamre ku owugenge , kiwe ekilago ku awantu woona mbwe olamre . ”
42005015	Kukawa mbwe yamugaania mbwe atalaga awantu amangʼana gaae ago , ni gaailanzia kuwungi okukira , kandi omurima ogwa awantu gwazanga okutegerezia Yesu no okulamiwua ku amalwire gaawu .
42005016	Ni kangi Yesu yawaemangako okugia okuwa omwene mu ekeewa na asawa .
42005017	Owuire wulala ni Yesu yawanga na agerera , * Awafarisaayo na * awagerezi awa endagirra awaaemanga mu ewitemo wiona ewia Galiili , na awaaemanga Yudeea ni Yerusaleemu , waaza waikala ao . Amaani aga * Omwami Katonda gaawanga ao aga okulamia awalwire .
42005018	Awantu wandi waaza ni wagingre omulwire owa omuwiri gufwire engʼanzi ku iseero kandi waagalanga mbwe waingire mu enyumba wamute emberi owa Yesu .
42005019	Ni ngawakatuukra engira eya okuingira mu enyumba aeniki awantu waawanga ni waizuule enyumba du okutuuka ku ekiriango . Kutio , waaniina kungulu ku olusala walutagula kandi wamuisia mu enyumba agati ya awantu emberi wa Yesu na agonere ku iseero .
42005020	Olwa Yesu yawona okuganya okwa waawanga nakwo , yawoola otino , “ Omuzia , amawi gaao orekeerwe . ”
42005021	Awafarisaayo na awagerezi awa endagirra waatanika okuiwuuzia watino , “ Ono naanu oifwanania ni Katonda ono ? Naanu oesa okurekera awantu owuoni ogawuuke ni Katonda omwene ? ”
42005022	Yesu yamanya ekia waaiwuuzianga kandi yawairania otino , “ Ekigera ni muiwuuzia ku amangʼana gano mu emioyo giinyu niki ?
42005023	Ekiwuuwu okukola niki , okuwoola mbwe ‘ Amawi gaao orekeerwe , ’ nakuwa okuwoola mbwe ‘ Ema ogende-gende ’ ?
42005024	Ni kugere mumanye mbwe * Omuzia owa Omuntu ari na amaani aga okurekera awantu amawi ku ekialo kuno … ” yalaga omuntu owa omuwiri gwafwa engʼanzi oyo otino , “ Nkulaga mbwe ema otoole iseero riao ogie engo . ”
42005025	Mu enyinga ezio yaimerra emberi waawu , atoola ekintu ekia yawanga na agonereko , afuma agia engo na atondowola Katonda .
42005026	Awantu woona waaluguula ino kandi waatondowola Katonda . Owuti wuawa-amba kandi waawoola watino , “ Reero tuwuine ewintu ewikate-kaate ewiluguulwa ! ”
42005027	Nikuemao Yesu yafuma okugia kandi ni yagianga yawona omusolozi owa * omusolo oetwa mbwe Laawi na aikaale mu enyumba omwa awantu waafumiangamo omusolo . Yesu yalaga omuntu oyo mbwe , “ Ndonde . ”
42005028	Laawi yaema areka ewintu wiona atanika okumulonda .
42005029	Nikuemao Laawi yakorra Yesu owugeni owunene mu enyumba yaae , kandi omurima ogwa awasolozi awa omusolo na awantu wandi waaria nawo alala .
42005030	Awafarisaayo na awagerezi awa endagirra awaawanga ao waasoozia awalonzi awa Yesu watino , “ Ekigera ni muria kandi munywa na awasolozi awa omusolo na ‘ awooni ’ niki ? ”
42005031	Yesu yawairania otino , “ Awiifu kane awalwire , nganiwo awaagala omurezi ? Awalamu iwo waagarraki omurezi ?
42005032	Inze ngʼanyakaaza okueta awantu awigolovu , ni nyaazra awooni kugere wagaluke wareke owuoni . ”
42005033	Awantu wandi waalaga Yesu watino , “ Awalonzi awa Yowaana kangi wasiwa okuria ni wasawa , namba awalonzi awa Awafarisaayo woona wakola watio , ni iwue awaao waria kandi wanywa-unywa . ”
42005034	Yesu yawawuuzia otino , “ Awageni awa owugeni owua enserezi wakasiwa okuria otie ni ngʼina enserezi akiari nawo ?
42005035	Amiire gaaza aga ngʼina enserezi oyo aaza okutoolwao awaemeko , nikwo warisiwa okuria . ”
42005036	Yawalaga olugero luno : “ Awulao omuntu otoola ekiraka ku enguwo empia kandi yakinawa ku enguwo enkiire . Ni na akorre otio , aaza okutandula enguwo empia eyo , ni kandi ekiraka ekiyia ekio ngakiiza okuambana geeza ne enguwo enkiire eyo .
42005037	Lwona , awulao oesa okuta edivaai empia mu ekimuga ekia edivaai ekia iseero ikulu . Ni na akorre otio , edivaai eyo eeza okuzimbia iseero erio ritanduke kandi edivaai eene efugike , kandi ekimuga ekia iseero ekio kioneke .
42005038	Kutio edivaai empia paka eteewue mu ekimuga ekia iseero iyia .
42005039	Lwona , omuntu omiire okunala mu enkola enkulu ngagala okugaluka ku enkola empia , aeniki awona mbwe enkola ziae enkulu ezio ziri endootu . ”
42006001	Owuire wulala olwa * Sabato , Yesu yawitanga mu emisiri egia engaano . Awalonzi waae waatanika okuiiya ewigala ewia engaano , ni wazikunya-kunya mu amakono gaawu ni waria .
42006002	Na * Awafarisaayo wandi waawawuuzia watino , “ Muiiya ewigala ewia engaano olwa Sabato kolaki , ne endagirra iifu ngetuganyiire okukola otio ? ”
42006003	Yesu yawairania otino , “ Inywe mukiari okusoma ekia Omwami Daudi yakola olwa iye alala na awantu awayawanga nawo waawurranga enzala ?
42006004	Yagia mu enyumba eya Katonda aeewua emikaati egitengeekwe emberi wa Katonda aria . Emikaati egia endagirra etaganyiire omuntu-umuntu okuria mala * awoozia wengʼene , kandi yaesania egindi ku awantu awaawanga nae wagiria . ”
42006005	Yesu yamariizia na awalaga otino , “ * Omuzia owa Omuntu nio Omwami owa Sabato . ”
42006006	Owuire wundi olwa Sabato , Yesu yaingira mu * esinagoogi atanika okugerera . Omwo yawangao omuntu owa okukono kwae okusaaza kwaremera .
42006007	Awafarisaayo na * awagerezi awa endagirra waagalanga ekintu ekia wakamuingirra nakio mbwe aonre Sabato .
42006008	Ni Yesu yamanya ekia waingirizianga , kutio yalaga omuntu owa okukono kwaremera oyo otino , “ Iza oimerre emberi ano . ” Omuntu oyo yaema kandi aimerra ao .
42006009	Nikuemao Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Mbawuuzia , niki ekia endagirra iifu etuganyiire okukola olwa Sabato ? Okukola geeza nakuwa okukola owuwiiwi ? Okutunzia owulamu owua omuntu nakuwa okuwuona ? ”
42006010	Yawawarra woona awasunguuzia nikwo amulaga otino , “ Golola okukono kwao . ” Yakola otio kandi okukono okwo kwairana kuwa okulamu ngʼese .
42006011	Okusu kwa-amba Awafarisaayo na awagerezi awa endagirra ino , okwagera watanika okugamba-gamba agati yaawu ku ekia wakakorra Yesu .
42006012	Mu amiire ago , Yesu yafuma agia mu ekigiri okusawa , kandi yawa eyo owuire owulamba na asawa Katonda nawuno wukia .
42006013	Ni wuakia , yaeta awalonzi waae kandi alowola awantu ikumi ni wawiri agati yaawu , awa yaeta mbwe * awatumwa waae .
42006014	Waawanga Simioni , owa yaluka mbwe Petro , Andereeya wamwawu Petro ; Yakoobo , Yowaana , Piliipo , Batholomeo ;
42006015	Mathaayo , Thomaasi , Yakoobo omuzia owa Alfaayo , Simioni , owaetwanga Omuzalooti ,
42006016	Yudaasi omuzia owa Yakoobo , ni Yudaasi Iskarioti , owawa omuguzi owa Yesu .
42006017	Yaika nawo agia aimerra mu ekiriwo . Omurima ogwa awalonzi waae waawanga ao alala na awantu awangi owuluku awaaema mu ewialo wiona ewia Yudeea ni Yerusaleemu na awaema mu ewialo ewia Taaya ni Sidooni ewiri ku omwalo ogwa Galiili , waaza okumutegerezia no okulamiwua ku amalwire gaawu .
42006018	Awantu awa * ewikeeno wianyaasianga , waalamiwua .
42006019	Awantu woona waagalanga mbwe wamuambeko , aeniki amaani gaamuemangako ni galamia awalwire woona .
42006020	Yesu yawarra awalonzi waae nikwo awalaga otino , “ Musereekwe inywe awamanyire mbwe muri awataka awa ensereki ezia mu omwoyo , aeniki * Owuami owua Katonda wuri owuinyu .
42006021	Musereekwe inywe awari ne enzala nyingeeno , aeniki muuza okuigusiwua . Musereekwe inywe awarra nyingeeno , aeniki muuza okuseka .
42006022	Musereekwe inywe na awantu wawarega , ni wawalowa kandi ni wawanyega , ni waona amiina giinyu , ku olugonzi olwa mugonziizie nalwo Omuzia owa Omuntu .
42006023	“ Musangaale kandi muomererwe , aeniki omugawo ogwa muwiikiirwe ku igulu guri omukaate . Aeniki , nintio waaguukwa waawu waakorra * awagambi awakulu .
42006024	“ Ni , muri owuwiiwi inywe awanyazi , aeniki mumiire okutuukra owulootu wuinyu .
42006025	Muri owuwiiwi inywe awaiguta ku enyingeeno , aeniki muriongera enzala . Muri owuwiiwi inywe awaseka ku enyinga zino aeniki muuza okurira na amaziga garerenga .
42006026	Muri owuwiiwi inywe awa awantu wagamba-gambako geeza , aeniki nintio lwona waaguukwa waawu waakorra awagambi awa owuweeyi .
42006027	“ Ni mbalaga inywe awantegerezia , mbwe mugonzie awazigu wiinyu , mukorre awawarega geeza .
42006028	Musereke awantu awawafuuwa , kandi musawire awantu awawakorra ewintu ewiwiiwi .
42006029	No omuntu akukubre oluyu oluwega olulala , mugalusizie oluwega lundi lwona akube . No omuntu atoorre ikooti riao , otamulowera okutoola esaati yaao yoona .
42006030	Omuntu-umuntu okusawire ekintu mu-ee , kandi no omuntu atoorre ekintu kiao otamunigirizia akuiranizie .
42006031	Kandi korra awandi ewia okaagala mbwe woona wakukorre .
42006032	“ Iwue no ogonziizie mala awakugonziizie wengʼene , ao otio ekia okakaserekrwa niki ? Aeniki namba ‘ awooni ’ woona wakola watio .
42006033	Kandi no okola geeza mala ku awantu awakukorra geeza , ao ekia okaserekrwa niki ? Aeniki namba ‘ awooni ’ woona wakola watio .
42006034	Iwue no ozia mala awantu awaesa waakuiranizia , ao ekia okaserekerwa niki ? Namba ‘ awooni ’ woona waozia ‘ awooni ’ awiina waawu ni warindirra okuiraniziwua .
42006035	Ni , mugonzie awazigu wiinyu , muwakorre geeza , kandi muwaozie ni mutawariire mbwe waaza okuwairanizia . Nikuemao omugawo gwinyu guuza okuwa omunene , kandi muuza okuwa awaana awa Katonda omunene , aeniki Katonda ari omusiza na awatairania otioo , na awa endandulu .
42006036	Muwe na amasaasra kiomo Soinyu ari na amasaasra .
42006037	“ Otakengera owundi ekiina , kugere iwue oona otakengerwa ekiina . Otata owuoni ku omuntu nikwo iwue oona ngoriteewuako owuoni . Rekera awandi amawi gaawu nikwo iwue oona orirekerwa amawi gaao .
42006038	Ezania ku awandi nikwo iwue oona ooza okueewua , mu omurengo omulootu , oguigatiirwe kandi oguizuule gwasaawaala , ooza okuteerwa mu amakono . Aeniki omurengo ogwa orenga nagwo , nigwo iwue oona ooza okurengerwa nagwo . ”
42006039	Lwona yawalaga olugero otino , “ Omuntu omuwuunu aesa otie okukangatra omuwuunu omwina waae ? Woona ngawaaza okugwa mu owuina ?
42006040	Omuntu oigerera ngakira omugerezi waae , no omuntu-umuntu na agereerwe nawuno ainogerezie geeza , aesa okuwa ki omugerezi waae .
42006041	Iwue niki ekigera no owarra akantu akatono akari mu eriiso eria omwina waao , no oguntu ogunene oguri mu eriiso riao omwene ngagukunyaasia ?
42006042	Oesa otie okulaga omwina waao mbwe , ‘ Wamwifu , reka nkutoorreo akaatu akari mu eriiso riao , ’ ni iwue omwene ngowona oguntu ogunene oguri mu eriiso riao ? Iwue omuntu oisemerezia ono , sooka otooleo oguntu ogunene gueme mu eriiso riao , nikwo ooza okuwona geeza , kandi oese okutoolao akaatu akatono mu eriiso eria omwina waao .
42006043	“ Guwulao omuti omulootu oguama ensaafu embiiwi , kandi guwulao omuti omuwiiwi oguama ensaafu endootu .
42006044	Kutio omuti ki omuti gumanywa ne ensaafu ziagwo . Ensaafu ezia emikuyu ngaziesa okunogwa okuema ku emiti egia amawua , nakuwa emizabiibu okuema ku omunyenya .
42006045	Omuntu omulootu afumia mala ewintu ewilootu okuema ku owulootu owuri mu omwoyo gwae , kandi omuntu omuwiiwi afumia mala ewintu ewiwiiwi okuema ku owuwi owuri mu omwoyo gwae . Aeniki ewintu ewia omunwa guwoola wiema mala ku ewiizuule omwoyo ogwa omuntu .
42006046	“ Ekigera ni munyeta mbwe ‘ Omwami , Omwami , ’ ni ngamukola ewia mbalaga niki ?
42006047	Nyiza okuwalaga kiomo omuntu onyizreko , owurra amangʼana gange kandi yakola nago , afwanana .
42006048	Afwanana no omuntu owa na aomboka enyumba , a-aawa na agia munsi nawuno owulusa wuatuuka ku iwaale . Olwa omugera gwaza kandi amanzi gaika , gaikuba ku enyumba eyo , enyumba ngekazegera , aeniki yawanga ne eombookwe wukalu .
42006049	No omuntu owurra amangʼana gange ni yareka okukola nago afwanana no omuntu owaomboka enyumba ku ilowa na ataawre owulusa . Olwa amanzi gaaika , gaikuba ku enyumba eyo , yagwa ansi boo , mala eoneka chee . ”
42007001	Olwa Yesu yamala okuwoola amangʼana gaae goona na awantu wamutegerezia , yaingira ku omugizi ogwa Kapernaumu .
42007002	Omwo , yawangao omukangasi owa awa-iiye owa Awaruumi owa owemirimo waae owa yawanga na agonziizie ino yalwalanga ampi okufwa .
42007003	Olwa omukangasi oyo yawurra mbwe Yesu ari ao , yatuma * awagaaka * Awayaudi okugia okumusawa mbwe aaze alamie owemirimo waae .
42007004	Olwa waatuuka ku Yesu , waamuisasaama ni wawoola watino , “ Omuntu ono osugaane omukorre geeza ,
42007005	aeniki agonziizie awiifu kandi yatuombokiire * esinagoogi . ”
42007006	Kutio , Yesu yagia nawo . Olwa Yesu yatuuka ampi ne enyumba , omukangasi oyo yatuma awiiko waae wamulage watino , “ Omwami , otainyaasia okuuza ano , aeniki ngʼansugre iwue okuingira mu enyumba yange .
42007007	Ekio nikio ekigera ni nyawona mbwe ntakuuzako omwene . Ni woola-uwoola ingʼana , kandi owemirimo wange aaza okuwa omulamu .
42007008	Inze omwene ndi omuntu ori ansi eya awandi , ni noona ndi na awa-iiye awakola ansi yange . Ni ndagre omulala mbwe , ‘ Gia , ’ agia kandi owundi mbwe ‘ Iza ano , ’ aaza-uuza . Ndaga * omukurumu wange mbwe , ‘ Kola kino , ’ kandi yakikola . ”
42007009	Olwa Yesu yawurra amangʼana gano , yaomererwa ino nae , kandi yagaluka awarra omurima ogwa awantu awaamulondanga awalaga otino , “ Mbalaga mbwe namba mu ekialo ekia Israeli ano , okuemera ri nkiari okutuukrako omuntu namba omulala , ori no okuganya okunene kutino . ”
42007010	Nikuemao awantu awaatumwa waria waairana mu enyumba watuukra no owemirimo oyo amiire okulama .
42007011	Enkio walwo , Yesu yagia ku omugizi oguetwa mbwe Naini , kandi omurima ogwa awantu alala na awalonzi waae waagia nae .
42007012	Ni yatuuka ampi ne ekikulo ekia omugizi ogwo , ya-agaana awantu ni wagingre ekitundu ekia omufu ni wafuma nakio enze eya omugizi . Omufu oyo yawanga omuzia omulala engʼene owa omukazi omufwire kandi awantu awangi awa ku omugizi ogwo waawanga no omukazi oyo .
42007013	Olwa Omwami yamuwona , yamuambra amasaasra mu omwoyo mala amulaga otino , “ Reka okurra . ”
42007014	Nikuemao yagia ampi a-amba iseero erigingrweko omufu oyo kandi awaawanga ni wamugingre waaimerra . Yawoola otino , “ Omuwuuka ono , emaa ! ”
42007015	Omufu oyo yaema aikala kandi atanika okugamba-gamba , kandi Yesu yamuiranizia ngʼina .
42007016	Owuti owungi owuluguulwa wua-amba awantu awo ino kandi waatondowola Katonda ni wawoola watino , “ * Omugambi omunene afumre agati iifu . Katonda omwene amiire okuuza okutunzia awantu waae . ”
42007017	Amangʼana agaaikola gano gaailanzia mu ewialo wiona ewia Yudeea ne ewialo windi ewiri ampi ao .
42007018	Awalonzi awa Yowaana Omubatiisi waamulaga ewintu ewiaikola wino wiona .
42007019	Yaeta awawiri ku iwo awatuma ku * Omwami Yesu , wagie wamuwuuzie watino , “ Ni iwue omuntu owasugananga aaze , kusi tusugaane turindirre owundi ? ”
42007020	Olwa awantu wano waatuuka ku Yesu , waamulaga watino , “ Yowaana Omubatiisi atutumre kugere tukuwuuzie otino , ‘ Ni iwue omuntu owasugananga aaze , kusi tusugaane turindirre owundi ? ’ ”
42007021	Mu enyinga ezio , Yesu yalamia awantu awangi ku amalwire gaawu , awaawanga awatekere , awaawanga ne * ewikeeno kandi yaigulao amiiso aga awantu awangi awaawanga awawuunu .
42007022	Nikuemao yawairania otino , “ Mugie mulage Yowaana ewintu ewia muwuine ne ewia muwuriire : Awawuunu wawona , awarema wagenda-genda , awa owugenge walamiwua , awa amatwi amaziwu wawurra , awafu waziusiwua , kandi amangʼana amalootu galanziziwua awataka .
42007023	Omuntu otairana enyima ku amangʼana gange asereekwe . ”
42007024	Olwa * awatumwa awa Yowaana waamala okufuma wagia , Yesu yatanika okugamba-gambra omurima ogwa awantu ogwo ku Yowaana otino , “ Olwa mwagia ku Yowaana mu ekeewa , ekia mwagia okuwona niki ? Kusi ekituutu ekiyunziwua-yunziwua no omuyaga ?
42007025	Ni kutari kutio , ekia mwagia enze eyo okuwona niki ? Omuntu oingiizie enguwo endootu ? Yawa ! Awantu awaingizia enguwo endootu-ndootu kandi awamenyere owulamu owua kungulu , waituukrana mu amayumba aga awaami .
42007026	Ekia mwagia enze eyo okuwona katio niki ? Omugambi ? Ee , omugambi kandi mbalaga mbwe akirre omugambi no okukira .
42007027	Ono nio omuntu owajojwako kale mbwe , “ ‘ Wona , nyiza okutuma omutumwa wange emberi waao , orikangata emberi waao akugolorre engira . ’
42007028	Mbalaga kuwuene mbwe ku awantu woona awa awakazi waiwuule , awulaoko namba omulala omiire okuwaao okira Yowaana . Kukawa kutio , omuntu omutono otuukre mu * Owuami owua Katonda amukirre . ”
42007029	Awantu woona namba awasolozi awa * omusolo awaawurra okulanzia kwae , waaganya mbwe okwo nikwo okwawanga engira eya Katonda eri kuwuene , aeniki woona waabasiitwa ni Yowaana .
42007030	Na * Awafarisaayo na * awagerezi awa endagirra , iwo waalowa okuagala okwa Katonda mu owulamu wuawu , ku okulowa okubatiiswa ni Yowaana .
42007031	“ Awantu awa ikula rino nyesa okuwafwanania naki katio ?
42007032	Wafwana awaana awaikaale mu ekiiyia awaogerera ni waeta awaana awiina waawu watino , “ ‘ Twawakubra ekituutu , ni ngamukazina ; Twawaembera olwembo olwa olumbe , ni ngamukarra . ’
42007033	Yowaana Omubatiisi , iye ngakaweerao na aria kandi na anywa . Kino kiagera ni muwoola mbwe , ‘ Omuntu ono ari ne ekikeeno ! ’
42007034	No * Omuzia owa Omuntu iye aria kandi anywa , kandi okwo kugera ni muwoola mbwe , ‘ Omuntu ono agonziizie okuria kandi ari omunywi . Lwona ari omwiko owa awasolozi awa omusolo na awooni . ’
42007035	No owuganga wulaganwa mu enkola . ”
42007036	Omufarisaayo wundi yaeta Yesu owugeni okuria nae okuria okwa igulo . Kutio Yesu yagia mu enyumba yaae okuria .
42007037	Omukazi wundi owa ku omugizi ogwo , owawanga na amenyere owulamu owua owuoni , olwa yawurra mbwe Yesu aria omwa Omufarisaayo oyo , yareeta amavuta agawunya esaami mu ichupa eria alabasta .
42007038	Yagia aimerra emugongo nyamagulu aga Yesu owawanga na aigoloole na aria ku emeesa . Yarra amaziga ni gaika , kandi yatanika okuwaka amagulu aga Yesu na amaziga ago , na agaeeya ne emvwiri ezia ku omutwe gwae . Yamunuuna amagulu na amu-aa owuti kandi * yagawaka na amavuta ago .
42007039	Olwa Omufarisaayo owamueta owugeni yawona ekiaikola kino , yawoola mu omwoyo gwae otino , “ Kuweeko mbwe omuntu ono ari omugambi , akamanyire omukazi omuambreko ono , lwona akamanyire mbwe omukazi ono ari omwoni . ”
42007040	Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Simioni , kirio ekintu ekia nyagala okukulaga . ” Simioni yamuirania otino , “ Woola , omugerezi . ”
42007041	Yesu yatanika otino , “ Awantu wawiri waawanga no omusango ogwa omuntu oozia awantu amasendi . Omulala yawanga no omusango ogwa edinaari mia witaanu no owundi ogwa edinaari amakumi ataanu .
42007042	Woona wawiri waawulanga na amasendi agasuga aga wakamuoloola nago omusango ogwo . Kutio omwene amasendi yawarekera emisango egio . Naanu agati ya awawiri wano ooza okumugonzia ino okukira owundi ? ”
42007043	Simioni yairania otino , “ Mbona mbwe no omuntu owarekerwa omusango omunene oria . ” Yesu yamuirania otino , “ Owoorre kuwuene . ”
42007044	Nikuemao , yagaluka awarra omukazi oyo nikwo alaga Simioni otino , “ Owona omukazi ono ? Nyizre mu enyumba yaao muno , ni ngokampa amanzi aga okuozia amagulu , ni iye anyoziizie amagulu na amaziga gaae kandi agaeeya ne emvwiri ziae .
42007045	Ngokankeezia na amakeezio aga olugonzi , no omukazi ono amiire okuwa na anuuna amagulu gange na ampa owuti okuemera nyingiire ano .
42007046	Ngokambaka amavuta ku omutwe , ni iye amiire okuwaka amagulu gange na amavuta agawunya esaami .
42007047	Kutio , nkulaga mbwe amiire okurekerwa owuoni wuae owungi , aeniki angonziizie owungi . Omuntu orekeerwe amatono , oona olugonzi lwae lutono . ”
42007048	Nikuemao Yesu yalaga omukazi oyo otino , “ Amawi gaao orekeerwe . ”
42007049	Awageni wandi waatanika okungʼongʼoona agati yaawu ni wawoola watino , “ Ono no omuntuki ono , orekera awantu namba amawi gaawu ? ”
42007050	Yesu yalaga omukazi oyo otino , “ Okuganya kwao kukununuule mu amawi , gia no owuolu . ”
42008001	Lunyima , Yesu yagia na awita mu emigizi eminene ne ewitemo wiona na alanzia amangʼana amalootu aga * Owuami owua Katonda . Awalonzi waae ikumi ni wawiri waagia nae ,
42008002	alala na awakazi wandi awaalamiwua okuema ku * ewikeeno na amalwire . Waawanga Maaria , omwala owa Eumagidaala owafumiziwuako ewikeeno musamvu ,
42008003	Yoani muka Chuuza owawanga omukangasi owa enyumba eya * Eroode , Susaana , na awandi awangi . Awakazi wano waawanga ni wawariisia kandi ni wawarindre mala ne ewintu ewiawu aweene .
42008004	Owuire wundi awantu awangi , awaema mu emigizi egigawuke-gawuuke , waaikumia alala wagia ku Yesu kandi yawalaga mu olugero otino ,
42008005	“ Omurimi yagia okumwa emwo yaae . Ni yamwanga , emwo indi yagwa ku engira , etazwa-tazwa kandi enyonyi ezia ku omuyaga ziaza zigiria chwe .
42008006	Emwo indi yagwa ku olutare , kandi olwa yameranga , yakala aeniki amanzi gaawulanga mu ilowa .
42008007	Ne emwo indi yagwa mu amawua , kandi amawua ago gaakoma nayo gagisindigania mala ereka okukoma geeza .
42008008	Ne emwo indi yagwa mu ilowa ilootu kandi yakoma geeza elawa emere enyingi , entunda mia kilala okukira eyamwewua . ” Olwa yawoola amangʼana gano , yawasiagizia otino , “ Omuntu ori na amatwi aga okuwurra , ka-awurre ! ”
42008009	Awalonzi waae waamuwuuzia ekia olugero olwo lulagana .
42008010	Yesu yawalaga otino , “ Inywe ni inywe awaeerwe okumanya owueru owua ewintu ewiiwisre ewia Owuami owua Katonda . Ni ku awandi walagwa mu engero kugere , “ ‘ kukawa mbwe wawarra , ni watawona , kandi kukawa mbwe wategerezia , ni watawurra . ’
42008011	“ Kino nikio ekia olugero luno lulagana . Emwo na amangʼana aga Katonda .
42008012	Engira eya emwo yagwako eimeriire awantu awawurra amangʼana , ne * Ekikeeno kiiza kiawanyaga amangʼana ago okuema mu emioyo giawu , kugere wataganya nago kandi wanunulwe .
42008013	No olutare olwa emwo yagwako luimeriire awantu awa ni wawuriire amangʼana wagaingizia no owusangaavu . Ni wawula ne emizi , kutio wagaganyako ku amiire amatono , kandi enyinga ezia wageezaniwua , wagareka wairana enyima .
42008014	Amawua aga emwo yagwamo gaimeriire awantu awawurra amangʼana , no okuingirizia okwa owulamu , ensemerezanio eya owunyazi alala ne ewisangaalo ewia ekialo , wisindigania amangʼana ago kandi ensaafu ziareka okutuuka .
42008015	Ilowa ilootu eria emwo yagwamo , ri-imeriire awantu awawurra amangʼana aga Katonda kandi waga-ambirra wukalu mu emioyo emilootu kandi egiri no okuwurra , wawa nago nawuno ensaafu ziatuuka .
42008016	“ Awulao omuntu oka-ambia ekimuri kandi yakifunikira ne ekidida nakuwa yakiwisa mu enkuriri . Ni , akita ku emeesa kugere awantu awaingira omwae wawone owueru owuo .
42008017	Aeniki kiwulao ekintu ekiiwisre ekitarifuma kiwoneke , lwona kiwulao ekintu ekiiwisre mu omwoyo ekitarimanyika , namba ekitarireetwa ku owueru .
42008018	Kutio muwarre geeza ku amangʼana aga muwurra . Aeniki , omuntu okola geeza ne ekia aegeekwe nio orisongwa . No omuntu otakola geeza ne ekia aegeekwe aaza okunyagulwa namba ekitono ekia yaegekwa . ”
42008019	Nikuemao ngʼinwawu Yesu ni waamwawu waae awekizia waaza ku iye , ni ngawakaesanga okumutuukako aeniki omurima ogwa awantu waawanga ni wamuikumreko .
42008020	Omuntu wundi yamulaga otino , “ Ngʼinwao ni waamwinyu awekizia wari enze waagala okukuwona . ”
42008021	Ni Yesu yawairania otino , “ Awantu awawurra amangʼana aga Katonda kandi waagalonda , niwo ngʼinoifu ni waamwifu awekizia . ”
42008022	Owuire wulala , Yesu yalaga awalonzi waae otino , “ Tuambuke tugie engereka indi eya enyanza . ” Kutio waaingira mu owuato wasiawala .
42008023	Ni waawungukanga , endoolo ziaira Yesu . Omuyaga omuzito gwatemuka mu enyanza kandi owuato wuatanika okuizula na amanzi . Kutio waawanga mu eminyako-nyaako eminene aeniki owuato wuagalanga okuniwa .
42008024	Awalonzi waae waagia wamulamusia ni wawoola watino , “ Omwami , Omwami , tufwa amanzi ! ” Yesu yaema kandi asikirra omuyaga na amasiira amakate-kaate ago kandi omuyaga ogwo gwaoreera kandi enyanza egwiriira ekitene .
42008025	Nikuemao yawawuuzia otino , “ Okuganya kwinyu kuri ? ” Waawanga no owuti kandi waaluguula ni waiwuuzia aweene mbwe , “ Ono no omuntuki ono , osikirra namba emiyaga na amasiira kandi gamuwurra ? ”
42008026	Waawunguka nawuno watuuka mu ekialo ekia Geraasi eri oluwega lundi olwa enyanza no oema Galiili .
42008027	Ni Yesu yafuma mu owuato ataza ku ekialo , omuntu ori ne ewikeeno owaemanga ku omugizi ogwa ao yamuaganra . Ku amiire amangi , omuntu ono yawanga na akiari okuiwoya enguwo nakuwa okumenya mu enyumba , ni yawanga na amenyere mu ewiwaga .
42008028	Olwa yawona Yesu , yarra wukalu kandi akuba amasigamo emberi waae , nikwo awoola no omwoyo oguri kungulu otino , “ Onyagalakooki Yesu Omuzia owa Katonda omunene okukira ? Nkuiyembere , otammala ! ”
42008029	Okwo kwatuukra ni Yesu amiire okusiagizia ekikeeno ekiwiiwi ekio mbwe kifume kieme ku omuntu oyo . Kangi , ne ekikeeno ekio kiawanga ni kimuniinre , omuntu oyo yawutulanga eminyororo egia yasiwirwanga amakono na amagulu na ateerwe asi eya owurinzi . Kandi ekikeeno ekio kiamuiranga mu ekeewa aa yaweranga omwene .
42008030	Nikuemao Yesu yamuwuuzia otino , “ Eriina riao naanu ? ” Yamuirania mbwe , “ Leejio , ” aeniki ewikeeno ewingi wiawanga ni wimumenyeremo .
42008031	Kandi wiaiyemba Yesu mbwe atawasikirra okuingira mu owuina owua olumbe .
42008032	Kuno kwatuukra no olwizo olwa enguruwe enyingi ziaaya ampi ao ku ekigiri . Kandi ewikeeno ewio wiaisasaama Yesu mbwe awiganyire wigie wi-ingire mu enguruwe ezio ; kutio yawiganyira okukola otio .
42008033	Nikuemao , ewikeeno ewio wiafuma ku omuntu oyo wigia wi-ingira mu enguruwe ezio , kandi enguruwe ziona mu olwizo olwo ziagondoka ne ekibuusi zigia zigwa ku oluwanga , ziolomoka mu enyanza mala zifwa ziona .
42008034	Olwa awaayi awa enguruwe ezio waawona ekiaikola ekio , waarumuka wagia walaga awantu awa ku omugizi gwawu ni mu ekialo ekio .
42008035	Nikuemao awantu waafuma okugia okuwona ekintu ekiaikola ekio . Waatuuka ku Yesu kandi watuukra omuntu owa ewikeeno wiawanga ni wifumreko oyo na aikaale ansi mu amagulu aga Yesu , na aingiizie enguwo kandi omutwe gwae ni guri omulootu . Ekio kiagera owuti wuwa-amba ino .
42008036	Awantu awaawona ekintu kino waagia waalaga awantu kiomo omuntu owa ewikeeno wiawangako oyo yalamiziiwua .
42008037	Nikuemao , awantu woona awa mu ewitemo ewiri Geraasi waasawa Yesu mbwe awaemeko agie ; aeniki owuti owungi wuawa-amba . Kutio Yesu yaingira mu owuato wasiawala ni wairana .
42008038	Omuntu owa ewikeeno wiawanga ni wifumreko oyo yaiyemba Yesu mbwe aganye agie nae . Ni Yesu yamulowera na amutuma otino ,
42008039	“ Irana engo , ogie owalage owulootu owua Katonda akukoriire . ” Kutio , omuntu oyo yagia agenda-genda ku omugizi ogwo gwona na alaga awantu owulootu owua Yesu amukoriire .
42008040	Olwa Yesu yairana , omurima ogwa awantu waamuaganra wamuingizia aeniki woona waamurindanga airane .
42008041	Omuntu wundi owaetwanga mbwe Jairo , owawanga omukangasi owa * esinagoogi , yaaza ku Yesu mala agwa mu amagulu gaae na amuiyemba mbwe wagie nae mu enyumba yaae ,
42008042	aeniki omwala waae omulala engʼene owa emiaka ikumi ni iwiri yawanga omulwire ino ampi okufwa . Ni Yesu yawanga ku engira na agia , omurima ogwa awantu awangi waamuisindiganiako embega ziona .
42008043	Yawangao omukazi wundi owa enda yawanga ne emiire okuwa ne esulula ku emiaka ikumi ni iwiri , na awulao omuntu owaesanga okumurera .
42008044	Yanyola agia nyamugongo ogwa Yesu a-amba enguwo yaae . Ku enyinga ezio , amasaai agaasululanga ago gaimerra kalala .
42008045	Yesu yawawuuzia otino , “ Ompambre naanu ? ” Olwa awantu woona waalowa mbwe ngawakamuambako , Petro yamulaga otino , “ Omwami , omurima guno gwona gukuisunguuzie kandi gukuisindiganieko . ”
42008046	Ni Yesu yawoola otino , “ Omuntu ampambre , aeniki mpuriire amaani ni gafuma ni gaanyemako . ”
42008047	Olwa omukazi oyo yawona mbwe ngaesa okuiwisa areke okumanyika , yagia ku Yesu na adada kandi akuba amasigamo emberi waae . Nikuemao yawoola na awantu woona wawurra ekiagera na amuambako , kandi kiomo alamre mala ku enyinga ezio .
42008048	Nikuemao Yesu yamulaga otino , “ Omwala wange , okuganya kwao kukulamiizie . Gia no owuolu . ”
